                  LCD_WR_REG PROC
;;;65     //regval:寄存器值
;;;66     void LCD_WR_REG(u16 regval)
000000  49fc              LDR      r1,|L1.1012|
;;;67     { 
;;;68     	LCD->LCD_REG=regval;//写入要写的寄存器序号	 
000002  8008              STRH     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;69     }
000004  4770              BX       lr
;;;70     //写LCD数据
                          ENDP

                  LCD_WR_DATA PROC
;;;71     //data:要写入的值
;;;72     void LCD_WR_DATA(u16 data)
000006  49fb              LDR      r1,|L1.1012|
;;;73     {										    	   
;;;74     	LCD->LCD_RAM=data;		 
000008  1c89              ADDS     r1,r1,#2
00000a  8008              STRH     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;75     }
00000c  4770              BX       lr
;;;76     //读LCD数据
                          ENDP

                  LCD_RD_DATA PROC
;;;77     //返回值:读到的值
;;;78     u16 LCD_RD_DATA(void)
00000e  48f9              LDR      r0,|L1.1012|
;;;79     {										    	   
;;;80     	return LCD->LCD_RAM;		 
000010  1c80              ADDS     r0,r0,#2
000012  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]
;;;81     }					   
000014  4770              BX       lr
;;;82     //写寄存器
                          ENDP

                  LCD_WriteReg PROC
;;;84     //LCD_RegValue:要写入的数据
;;;85     void LCD_WriteReg(u8 LCD_Reg, u16 LCD_RegValue)
000016  4af7              LDR      r2,|L1.1012|
;;;86     {	
;;;87     	LCD->LCD_REG = LCD_Reg;		//写入要写的寄存器序号	 
000018  8010              STRH     r0,[r2,#0]
;;;88     	LCD->LCD_RAM = LCD_RegValue;//写入数据

00001e  f8a21800          STRH     r1,[r2,#0x800]
;;;89     }	   
000022  4770              BX       lr
;;;90     //读寄存器

                  LCD_ReadReg PROC
;;;92     //返回值:读到的数据
;;;93     u16 LCD_ReadReg(u8 LCD_Reg)
000024  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;94     {										   
000026  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;95     	LCD_WR_REG(LCD_Reg);		//写入要读的寄存器序号
000028  4620              MOV      r0,r4
00002a  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WR_REG
;;;96     	delay_us(5);		  
00002e  2005              MOVS     r0,#5

;;;97     	return LCD_RD_DATA();		//返回读到的值
000034  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_RD_DATA
;;;98     }   
000038  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;99     //开始写GRAM
                          ENDP

                  LCD_WriteRAM_Prepare PROC

;;;101    {

                  LCD_WriteRAM PROC
;;;105    //RGB_Code:颜色值
;;;106    void LCD_WriteRAM(u16 RGB_Code)
000044  49eb              LDR      r1,|L1.1012|
;;;107    {							    
;;;108    	LCD->LCD_RAM = RGB_Code;//写十六位GRAM
000046  1c89              ADDS     r1,r1,#2
000048  8008              STRH     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;109    }
00004a  4770              BX       lr
;;;110    //从ILI93xx读出的数据为GBR格式，而我们写入的时候为RGB格式。
                          ENDP

                  LCD_BGR2RGB PROC
;;;113    //返回值：RGB格式的颜色值
;;;114    u16 LCD_BGR2RGB(u16 c)
00004c  b530              PUSH     {r4,r5,lr}
;;;115    {
00004e  4601              MOV      r1,r0
;;;116    	u16  r,g,b,rgb;   
;;;117    	b=(c>>0)&0x1f;
000050  f001041f          AND      r4,r1,#0x1f
;;;118    	g=(c>>5)&0x3f;
000054  f3c11345          UBFX     r3,r1,#5,#6
;;;119    	r=(c>>11)&0x1f;	 
000058  0aca              LSRS     r2,r1,#11
;;;120    	rgb=(b<<11)+(g<<5)+(r<<0);		 
00005a  02e5              LSLS     r5,r4,#11
00005c  eb051543          ADD      r5,r5,r3,LSL #5
000060  4415              ADD      r5,r5,r2
000062  b2a8              UXTH     r0,r5
;;;121    	return(rgb);
;;;122    } 
000064  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
;;;123    //当mdk -O1时间优化时需要设置
                          ENDP

                  opt_delay PROC
;;;124    //延时i
;;;125    void opt_delay(u8 i)
000066  bf00              NOP      
                  |L1.104|
;;;126    {
;;;127    	while(i--);
000068  0001              MOVS     r1,r0
00006a  f1a00201          SUB      r2,r0,#1
00006e  b2d0              UXTB     r0,r2
000070  d1fa              BNE      |L1.104|
;;;128    }
000072  4770              BX       lr
;;;129    //读取个某点的颜色值	 
                          ENDP

                  LCD_SetCursor PROC
;;;168    //Ypos:纵坐标
;;;169    void LCD_SetCursor(u16 Xpos, u16 Ypos)

;;;170    {

;;;173    		LCD_WR_REG(lcddev.setxcmd);

0000ba  d11d              BNE      |L1.248|
;;;180    	{
;;;181    		if(lcddev.dir==1)Xpos=lcddev.width-1-Xpos;//横屏时处理
0000bc  48ce              LDR      r0,|L1.1016|
0000be  7980              LDRB     r0,[r0,#6]  ; lcddev
0000c0  2801              CMP      r0,#1
0000c2  d104              BNE      |L1.206|
0000c4  48cc              LDR      r0,|L1.1016|

0000ca  1ac0              SUBS     r0,r0,r3
0000cc  b283              UXTH     r3,r0

;;;182    		LCD_WR_REG(lcddev.setxcmd);

;;;183    		LCD_WR_DATA(Xpos>>8);

;;;184    		LCD_WR_DATA(Xpos&0XFF);

0000de  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WR_DATA
;;;185    		LCD_WR_REG(lcddev.setycmd);

;;;186    		LCD_WR_DATA(Ypos>>8);

;;;187    		LCD_WR_DATA(Ypos&0XFF);

;;;189    	{
;;;190    		if(lcddev.dir==1)Xpos=lcddev.width-1-Xpos;//横屏其实就是调转x,y坐标

0000fa  7980              LDRB     r0,[r0,#6]  ; lcddev

0000fe  d104              BNE      |L1.266|
000100  48bd              LDR      r0,|L1.1016|
000102  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]  ; lcddev

;;;191    		LCD_WriteReg(lcddev.setxcmd, Xpos);

00010c  7a08              LDRB     r0,[r1,#8]  ; lcddev
00010e  4619              MOV      r1,r3
000110  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;192    		LCD_WriteReg(lcddev.setycmd, Ypos);

00011a  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg

;;;193    	}	 
;;;194    }

;;;195    //设置LCD的自动扫描方向
                          ENDP

                  LCD_ReadPoint PROC
;;;131    //返回值:此点的颜色
;;;132    u16 LCD_ReadPoint(u16 x,u16 y)
000120  e92d41f0          PUSH     {r4-r8,lr}
;;;133    {
000124  4604              MOV      r4,r0
000126  460d              MOV      r5,r1
;;;134     	u16 r=0,g=0,b=0;
000128  2600              MOVS     r6,#0
00012a  2700              MOVS     r7,#0
00012c  46b0              MOV      r8,r6
;;;135    	if(x>=lcddev.width||y>=lcddev.height)return 0;	//超过了范围,直接返回		   
00012e  48b2              LDR      r0,|L1.1016|

000132  42a0              CMP      r0,r4
000134  dd03              BLE      |L1.318|
000136  48b0              LDR      r0,|L1.1016|
000138  8840              LDRH     r0,[r0,#2]  ; lcddev
00013a  42a8              CMP      r0,r5
00013c  dc02              BGT      |L1.324|
                  |L1.318|
00013e  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
                  |L1.320|
;;;136    	LCD_SetCursor(x,y);	    
;;;137    	if(lcddev.id==0X9341||lcddev.id==0X6804)LCD_WR_REG(0X2E);//9341/6804 发送读GRAM指令
;;;138    	else LCD_WR_REG(R34);      		 				//其他IC发送读GRAM指令
;;;139     	if(lcddev.id==0X9320)opt_delay(2);				//FOR 9320,延时2us	    
;;;140    	if(LCD->LCD_RAM)r=0;							//dummy Read	   
;;;141    	opt_delay(2);	  
;;;142     	r=LCD->LCD_RAM;  		  						//实际坐标颜色
;;;143     	if(lcddev.id==0X9341)//9341要分2次读出
;;;144     	{
;;;145    		opt_delay(2);	  
;;;146    		b=LCD->LCD_RAM; 
;;;147    		g=r&0XFF;//对于9341,第一次读取的是RG的值,R在前,G在后,各占8位
;;;148    		g<<=8;
;;;149    	}else if(lcddev.id==0X6804)r=LCD->LCD_RAM;		//6804第二次读取的才是真实值
;;;150    	if(lcddev.id==0X9325||lcddev.id==0X4535||lcddev.id==0X4531||lcddev.id==0X8989||lcddev.id==0XB505)return r;//这几种IC直接返回颜色值
;;;151    	else if(lcddev.id==0X9341)return (((r>>11)<<11)|((g>>10)<<5)|(b>>11));	//ILI9341需要公式转换一下
;;;152    	else return LCD_BGR2RGB(r);												//其他IC
;;;153    }			 
000140  e8bd81f0          POP      {r4-r8,pc}
                  |L1.324|
000144  4629              MOV      r1,r5                 ;136
000146  4620              MOV      r0,r4                 ;136
000148  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_SetCursor

00014e  8880              LDRH     r0,[r0,#4]            ;137  ; lcddev
000150  f5a04113          SUB      r1,r0,#0x9300         ;137
000154  3941              SUBS     r1,r1,#0x41           ;137

000158  48a7              LDR      r0,|L1.1016|

                  LCD_DisplayOn PROC
;;;155    void LCD_DisplayOn(void)
000230  b500              PUSH     {lr}
;;;156    {					   
;;;157    	if(lcddev.id==0X9341||lcddev.id==0X6804)LCD_WR_REG(0X29);	//开启显示
000232  4871              LDR      r0,|L1.1016|
000234  8880              LDRH     r0,[r0,#4]  ; lcddev
000236  f5a04113          SUB      r1,r0,#0x9300
00023a  3941              SUBS     r1,r1,#0x41
00023c  d005              BEQ      |L1.586|
00023e  486e              LDR      r0,|L1.1016|
000240  8880              LDRH     r0,[r0,#4]  ; lcddev
000242  f5a041d0          SUB      r1,r0,#0x6800
000246  3904              SUBS     r1,#4
000248  d103              BNE      |L1.594|
                  |L1.586|
00024a  2029              MOVS     r0,#0x29
00024c  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WR_REG
000250  e004              B        |L1.604|
                  |L1.594|
;;;158    	else LCD_WriteReg(R7,0x0173); 								//开启显示
000252  f2401173          MOV      r1,#0x173
000256  2007              MOVS     r0,#7
000258  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
                  |L1.604|
;;;159    }	 
00025c  bd00              POP      {pc}
;;;160    //LCD关闭显示
                          ENDP

                  LCD_DisplayOff PROC
;;;161    void LCD_DisplayOff(void)
00025e  b500              PUSH     {lr}
;;;162    {	   
;;;163    	if(lcddev.id==0X9341||lcddev.id==0X6804)LCD_WR_REG(0X28);	//关闭显示
000260  4865              LDR      r0,|L1.1016|
000262  8880              LDRH     r0,[r0,#4]  ; lcddev
000264  f5a04113          SUB      r1,r0,#0x9300
000268  3941              SUBS     r1,r1,#0x41
00026a  d005              BEQ      |L1.632|
00026c  4862              LDR      r0,|L1.1016|
00026e  8880              LDRH     r0,[r0,#4]  ; lcddev
000270  f5a041d0          SUB      r1,r0,#0x6800
000274  3904              SUBS     r1,#4
000276  d103              BNE      |L1.640|
                  |L1.632|
000278  2028              MOVS     r0,#0x28
00027a  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WR_REG
00027e  e003              B        |L1.648|
                  |L1.640|
;;;164    	else LCD_WriteReg(R7,0x0);//关闭显示 
000280  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
000282  2007              MOVS     r0,#7
000284  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
                  |L1.648|
;;;165    }   
000288  bd00              POP      {pc}
;;;166    //设置光标位置
                          ENDP

                  LCD_Scan_Dir PROC
;;;199    //9320/9325/9328/4531/4535/1505/b505/8989/5408/9341等IC已经实际测试	   	   
;;;200    void LCD_Scan_Dir(u8 dir)
00028a  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;201    {
00028c  4603              MOV      r3,r0
;;;202    	u16 regval=0;
00028e  2400              MOVS     r4,#0
;;;203    	u8 dirreg=0;
000290  2500              MOVS     r5,#0
;;;204    	u16 temp;  
;;;205    	if(lcddev.dir==1&&lcddev.id!=0X6804)//横屏时，对6804不改变扫描方向！
000292  4859              LDR      r0,|L1.1016|
000294  7980              LDRB     r0,[r0,#6]  ; lcddev
000296  2801              CMP      r0,#1
000298  d11e              BNE      |L1.728|
00029a  4857              LDR      r0,|L1.1016|
00029c  8880              LDRH     r0,[r0,#4]  ; lcddev
00029e  f5a041d0          SUB      r1,r0,#0x6800
0002a2  3904              SUBS     r1,#4
0002a4  d018              BEQ      |L1.728|
;;;206    	{			   
;;;207    		switch(dir)//方向转换
0002a6  2b08              CMP      r3,#8
0002a8  d215              BCS      |L1.726|
0002aa  e8dff003          TBB      [pc,r3]
0002ae  0406              DCB      0x04,0x06
0002b0  080a0c0e          DCB      0x08,0x0a,0x0c,0x0e
0002b4  1012              DCB      0x10,0x12
;;;208    		{
;;;209    			case 0:dir=6;break;
0002b6  2306              MOVS     r3,#6
0002b8  e00d              B        |L1.726|
;;;210    			case 1:dir=7;break;
0002ba  2307              MOVS     r3,#7
0002bc  e00b              B        |L1.726|
;;;211    			case 2:dir=4;break;
0002be  2304              MOVS     r3,#4
0002c0  e009              B        |L1.726|
;;;212    			case 3:dir=5;break;
0002c2  2305              MOVS     r3,#5
0002c4  e007              B        |L1.726|
;;;213    			case 4:dir=1;break;
0002c6  2301              MOVS     r3,#1
0002c8  e005              B        |L1.726|
;;;214    			case 5:dir=0;break;
0002ca  2300              MOVS     r3,#0
0002cc  e003              B        |L1.726|
;;;215    			case 6:dir=3;break;
0002ce  2303              MOVS     r3,#3
0002d0  e001              B        |L1.726|
;;;216    			case 7:dir=2;break;	     
0002d2  2302              MOVS     r3,#2
0002d4  bf00              NOP      
                  |L1.726|
0002d6  bf00              NOP                            ;209
                  |L1.728|
;;;217    		}
;;;218    	}
;;;219    	if(lcddev.id==0x9341||lcddev.id==0X6804)//9341/6804,很特殊
0002d8  4847              LDR      r0,|L1.1016|
0002da  8880              LDRH     r0,[r0,#4]  ; lcddev
0002dc  f5a04113          SUB      r1,r0,#0x9300
0002e0  3941              SUBS     r1,r1,#0x41
0002e2  d005              BEQ      |L1.752|
0002e4  4844              LDR      r0,|L1.1016|
0002e6  8880              LDRH     r0,[r0,#4]  ; lcddev
0002e8  f5a041d0          SUB      r1,r0,#0x6800
0002ec  3904              SUBS     r1,#4
0002ee  d17d              BNE      |L1.1004|
                  |L1.752|
;;;220    	{
;;;221    		switch(dir)
0002f0  2b08              CMP      r3,#8
0002f2  d21c              BCS      |L1.814|
0002f4  e8dff003          TBB      [pc,r3]
0002f8  0406090c          DCB      0x04,0x06,0x09,0x0c
0002fc  0f121518          DCB      0x0f,0x12,0x15,0x18
;;;222    		{
;;;223    			case L2R_U2D://从左到右,从上到下
;;;224    				regval|=(0<<7)|(0<<6)|(0<<5); 
000300  bf00              NOP      
;;;225    				break;
000302  e014              B        |L1.814|
;;;226    			case L2R_D2U://从左到右,从下到上
;;;227    				regval|=(1<<7)|(0<<6)|(0<<5); 
000304  f0440480          ORR      r4,r4,#0x80
;;;228    				break;
000308  e011              B        |L1.814|
;;;229    			case R2L_U2D://从右到左,从上到下
;;;230    				regval|=(0<<7)|(1<<6)|(0<<5); 
00030a  f0440440          ORR      r4,r4,#0x40
;;;231    				break;
00030e  e00e              B        |L1.814|
;;;232    			case R2L_D2U://从右到左,从下到上
;;;233    				regval|=(1<<7)|(1<<6)|(0<<5); 
000310  f04404c0          ORR      r4,r4,#0xc0
;;;234    				break;	 
000314  e00b              B        |L1.814|
;;;235    			case U2D_L2R://从上到下,从左到右
;;;236    				regval|=(0<<7)|(0<<6)|(1<<5); 
000316  f0440420          ORR      r4,r4,#0x20
;;;237    				break;
00031a  e008              B        |L1.814|
;;;238    			case U2D_R2L://从上到下,从右到左
;;;239    				regval|=(0<<7)|(1<<6)|(1<<5); 
00031c  f0440460          ORR      r4,r4,#0x60
;;;240    				break;
000320  e005              B        |L1.814|
;;;241    			case D2U_L2R://从下到上,从左到右
;;;242    				regval|=(1<<7)|(0<<6)|(1<<5); 
000322  f04404a0          ORR      r4,r4,#0xa0
;;;243    				break;
000326  e002              B        |L1.814|
;;;244    			case D2U_R2L://从下到上,从右到左
;;;245    				regval|=(1<<7)|(1<<6)|(1<<5); 
000328  f04404e0          ORR      r4,r4,#0xe0
;;;246    				break;	 
00032c  bf00              NOP      
                  |L1.814|
00032e  bf00              NOP                            ;225
;;;247    		}
;;;248    		dirreg=0X36;
000330  2536              MOVS     r5,#0x36
;;;249     		regval|=0X08;//BGR   
000332  f0440408          ORR      r4,r4,#8
;;;250    		if(lcddev.id==0X6804)regval|=0x02;//6804的BIT6和9341的反了	   
000336  4830              LDR      r0,|L1.1016|
000338  8880              LDRH     r0,[r0,#4]  ; lcddev
00033a  f5a041d0          SUB      r1,r0,#0x6800
00033e  3904              SUBS     r1,#4
000340  d101              BNE      |L1.838|
000342  f0440402          ORR      r4,r4,#2
                  |L1.838|
;;;251    		LCD_WriteReg(dirreg,regval);
000346  4621              MOV      r1,r4
000348  4628              MOV      r0,r5
00034a  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;252     		if((regval&0X20)||lcddev.dir==1)
00034e  f0140f20          TST      r4,#0x20
000352  d103              BNE      |L1.860|
000354  4828              LDR      r0,|L1.1016|
000356  7980              LDRB     r0,[r0,#6]  ; lcddev
000358  2801              CMP      r0,#1
00035a  d10d              BNE      |L1.888|
                  |L1.860|
;;;253    		{
;;;254    			if(lcddev.width<lcddev.height)//交换X,Y
00035c  4826              LDR      r0,|L1.1016|
00035e  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]  ; lcddev
000360  4925              LDR      r1,|L1.1016|
000362  8849              LDRH     r1,[r1,#2]  ; lcddev
000364  4288              CMP      r0,r1
000366  da14              BGE      |L1.914|
;;;255    			{
;;;256    				temp=lcddev.width;
000368  4823              LDR      r0,|L1.1016|
00036a  8806              LDRH     r6,[r0,#0]  ; lcddev
;;;257    				lcddev.width=lcddev.height;
00036c  8840              LDRH     r0,[r0,#2]  ; lcddev
00036e  4922              LDR      r1,|L1.1016|
000370  8008              STRH     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;258    				lcddev.height=temp;
000372  4608              MOV      r0,r1
000374  8046              STRH     r6,[r0,#2]
000376  e00c              B        |L1.914|
                  |L1.888|
;;;259     			}
;;;260    		}else  
;;;261    		{
;;;262    			if(lcddev.width>lcddev.height)//交换X,Y
000378  481f              LDR      r0,|L1.1016|
00037a  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]  ; lcddev
00037c  491e              LDR      r1,|L1.1016|
00037e  8849              LDRH     r1,[r1,#2]  ; lcddev
000380  4288              CMP      r0,r1
000382  dd06              BLE      |L1.914|
;;;263    			{
;;;264    				temp=lcddev.width;
000384  481c              LDR      r0,|L1.1016|
000386  8806              LDRH     r6,[r0,#0]  ; lcddev
;;;265    				lcddev.width=lcddev.height;
000388  8840              LDRH     r0,[r0,#2]  ; lcddev
00038a  491b              LDR      r1,|L1.1016|
00038c  8008              STRH     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;266    				lcddev.height=temp;
00038e  4608              MOV      r0,r1
000390  8046              STRH     r6,[r0,#2]
                  |L1.914|
;;;267     			}
;;;268    		}  
;;;269    		LCD_WR_REG(lcddev.setxcmd); 
000392  4919              LDR      r1,|L1.1016|
000394  7a08              LDRB     r0,[r1,#8]  ; lcddev
000396  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WR_REG
;;;270    		LCD_WR_DATA(0);LCD_WR_DATA(0);
00039a  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
00039c  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WR_DATA
0003a0  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
0003a2  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WR_DATA
;;;271    		LCD_WR_DATA((lcddev.width-1)>>8);LCD_WR_DATA((lcddev.width-1)&0XFF);
0003a6  4914              LDR      r1,|L1.1016|
0003a8  8809              LDRH     r1,[r1,#0]  ; lcddev
0003aa  1e49              SUBS     r1,r1,#1
0003ac  f3c1200f          UBFX     r0,r1,#8,#16
0003b0  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WR_DATA
0003b4  4910              LDR      r1,|L1.1016|
0003b6  8809              LDRH     r1,[r1,#0]  ; lcddev
0003b8  1e49              SUBS     r1,r1,#1
0003ba  b2c8              UXTB     r0,r1
0003bc  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WR_DATA
;;;272    		LCD_WR_REG(lcddev.setycmd); 
0003c0  490d              LDR      r1,|L1.1016|
0003c2  7a48              LDRB     r0,[r1,#9]  ; lcddev
0003c4  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WR_REG
;;;273    		LCD_WR_DATA(0);LCD_WR_DATA(0);
0003c8  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
0003ca  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WR_DATA
0003ce  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
0003d0  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WR_DATA
;;;274    		LCD_WR_DATA((lcddev.height-1)>>8);LCD_WR_DATA((lcddev.height-1)&0XFF);  
0003d4  4908              LDR      r1,|L1.1016|
0003d6  8849              LDRH     r1,[r1,#2]  ; lcddev
0003d8  1e49              SUBS     r1,r1,#1
0003da  f3c1200f          UBFX     r0,r1,#8,#16
0003de  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WR_DATA
0003e2  4905              LDR      r1,|L1.1016|
0003e4  8849              LDRH     r1,[r1,#2]  ; lcddev
0003e6  1e49              SUBS     r1,r1,#1
0003e8  b2c8              UXTB     r0,r1
0003ea  e000              B        |L1.1006|
                  |L1.1004|
0003ec  e006              B        |L1.1020|
                  |L1.1006|
0003ee  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WR_DATA
0003f2  e035              B        |L1.1120|
                  |L1.1012|
                          DCD      0x6c0007fe
                  |L1.1016|
                          DCD      lcddev
                  |L1.1020|
;;;275      	}else 
;;;276    	{
;;;277    		switch(dir)
0003fc  2b08              CMP      r3,#8
0003fe  d21c              BCS      |L1.1082|
000400  e8dff003          TBB      [pc,r3]
000404  04070a0d          DCB      0x04,0x07,0x0a,0x0d
000408  0f121518          DCB      0x0f,0x12,0x15,0x18
;;;278    		{
;;;279    			case L2R_U2D://从左到右,从上到下
;;;280    				regval|=(1<<5)|(1<<4)|(0<<3); 
00040c  f0440430          ORR      r4,r4,#0x30
;;;281    				break;
000410  e013              B        |L1.1082|
;;;282    			case L2R_D2U://从左到右,从下到上
;;;283    				regval|=(0<<5)|(1<<4)|(0<<3); 
000412  f0440410          ORR      r4,r4,#0x10
;;;284    				break;
000416  e010              B        |L1.1082|
;;;285    			case R2L_U2D://从右到左,从上到下
;;;286    				regval|=(1<<5)|(0<<4)|(0<<3);
000418  f0440420          ORR      r4,r4,#0x20
;;;287    				break;
00041c  e00d              B        |L1.1082|
;;;288    			case R2L_D2U://从右到左,从下到上
;;;289    				regval|=(0<<5)|(0<<4)|(0<<3); 
00041e  bf00              NOP      
;;;290    				break;	 
000420  e00b              B        |L1.1082|
;;;291    			case U2D_L2R://从上到下,从左到右
;;;292    				regval|=(1<<5)|(1<<4)|(1<<3); 
000422  f0440438          ORR      r4,r4,#0x38
;;;293    				break;
000426  e008              B        |L1.1082|
;;;294    			case U2D_R2L://从上到下,从右到左
;;;295    				regval|=(1<<5)|(0<<4)|(1<<3); 
000428  f0440428          ORR      r4,r4,#0x28
;;;296    				break;
00042c  e005              B        |L1.1082|
;;;297    			case D2U_L2R://从下到上,从左到右
;;;298    				regval|=(0<<5)|(1<<4)|(1<<3); 
00042e  f0440418          ORR      r4,r4,#0x18
;;;299    				break;
000432  e002              B        |L1.1082|
;;;300    			case D2U_R2L://从下到上,从右到左
;;;301    				regval|=(0<<5)|(0<<4)|(1<<3); 
000434  f0440408          ORR      r4,r4,#8
;;;302    				break;	 
000438  bf00              NOP      
                  |L1.1082|
00043a  bf00              NOP                            ;281
;;;303    		}
;;;304    		if(lcddev.id==0x8989)//8989 IC
00043c  48ff              LDR      r0,|L1.2108|
00043e  8880              LDRH     r0,[r0,#4]  ; lcddev
000440  f5a04109          SUB      r1,r0,#0x8900
000444  3989              SUBS     r1,r1,#0x89
000446  d104              BNE      |L1.1106|
;;;305    		{
;;;306    			dirreg=0X11;
000448  2511              MOVS     r5,#0x11
;;;307    			regval|=0X6040;	//65K   
00044a  f2460040          MOV      r0,#0x6040
00044e  4304              ORRS     r4,r4,r0
000450  e002              B        |L1.1112|
                  |L1.1106|
;;;308    	 	}else//其他驱动IC		  
;;;309    		{
;;;310    			dirreg=0X03;
000452  2503              MOVS     r5,#3
;;;311    			regval|=1<<12;  
000454  f4445480          ORR      r4,r4,#0x1000
                  |L1.1112|
;;;312    		}
;;;313    		LCD_WriteReg(dirreg,regval);
000458  4621              MOV      r1,r4
00045a  4628              MOV      r0,r5
00045c  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
                  |L1.1120|
;;;314    	}
;;;315    }   
000460  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
;;;316    //画点
                          ENDP

                  LCD_DrawPoint PROC
;;;318    //POINT_COLOR:此点的颜色
;;;319    void LCD_DrawPoint(u16 x,u16 y)
000462  b530              PUSH     {r4,r5,lr}
;;;320    {
000464  4604              MOV      r4,r0
000466  460d              MOV      r5,r1
;;;321    	LCD_SetCursor(x,y);		//设置光标位置 
000468  4629              MOV      r1,r5
00046a  4620              MOV      r0,r4
00046c  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_SetCursor
;;;322    	LCD_WriteRAM_Prepare();	//开始写入GRAM
000470  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteRAM_Prepare
;;;323    	LCD->LCD_RAM=POINT_COLOR; 
000474  48f2              LDR      r0,|L1.2112|
000476  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]  ; POINT_COLOR
000478  49f2              LDR      r1,|L1.2116|
00047a  8008              STRH     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;324    }
00047c  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
;;;325    //快速画点
                          ENDP

                  LCD_Fast_DrawPoint PROC
;;;327    //color:颜色
;;;328    void LCD_Fast_DrawPoint(u16 x,u16 y,u16 color)
00047e  b530              PUSH     {r4,r5,lr}
;;;329    {	   
000480  4603              MOV      r3,r0
000482  460c              MOV      r4,r1
000484  4615              MOV      r5,r2
;;;330    	if(lcddev.id==0X9341)
000486  48ed              LDR      r0,|L1.2108|
000488  8880              LDRH     r0,[r0,#4]  ; lcddev
00048a  f5a04113          SUB      r1,r0,#0x9300
00048e  3941              SUBS     r1,r1,#0x41
000490  d114              BNE      |L1.1212|
;;;331    	{
;;;332    		LCD_WR_REG(lcddev.setxcmd); 
000492  49ea              LDR      r1,|L1.2108|
000494  7a08              LDRB     r0,[r1,#8]  ; lcddev
000496  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WR_REG
;;;333    		LCD_WR_DATA(x>>8); 
00049a  1218              ASRS     r0,r3,#8
00049c  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WR_DATA
;;;334    		LCD_WR_DATA(x&0XFF);	 
0004a0  b2d8              UXTB     r0,r3
0004a2  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WR_DATA
;;;335    		LCD_WR_REG(lcddev.setycmd); 
0004a6  49e5              LDR      r1,|L1.2108|
0004a8  7a48              LDRB     r0,[r1,#9]  ; lcddev
0004aa  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WR_REG
;;;336    		LCD_WR_DATA(y>>8); 
0004ae  1220              ASRS     r0,r4,#8
0004b0  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WR_DATA
;;;337    		LCD_WR_DATA(y&0XFF);
0004b4  b2e0              UXTB     r0,r4
0004b6  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WR_DATA
0004ba  e036              B        |L1.1322|
                  |L1.1212|
;;;338    	}else if(lcddev.id==0X6804)
0004bc  48df              LDR      r0,|L1.2108|
0004be  8880              LDRH     r0,[r0,#4]  ; lcddev
0004c0  f5a041d0          SUB      r1,r0,#0x6800
0004c4  3904              SUBS     r1,#4
0004c6  d11d              BNE      |L1.1284|
;;;339    	{		    
;;;340    		if(lcddev.dir==1)x=lcddev.width-1-x;//横屏时处理
0004c8  48dc              LDR      r0,|L1.2108|
0004ca  7980              LDRB     r0,[r0,#6]  ; lcddev
0004cc  2801              CMP      r0,#1
0004ce  d104              BNE      |L1.1242|
0004d0  48da              LDR      r0,|L1.2108|
0004d2  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]  ; lcddev
0004d4  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1
0004d6  1ac0              SUBS     r0,r0,r3
0004d8  b283              UXTH     r3,r0
                  |L1.1242|
;;;341    		LCD_WR_REG(lcddev.setxcmd); 
0004da  49d8              LDR      r1,|L1.2108|
0004dc  7a08              LDRB     r0,[r1,#8]  ; lcddev
0004de  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WR_REG
;;;342    		LCD_WR_DATA(x>>8); 
0004e2  1218              ASRS     r0,r3,#8
0004e4  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WR_DATA
;;;343    		LCD_WR_DATA(x&0XFF);	 
0004e8  b2d8              UXTB     r0,r3
0004ea  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WR_DATA
;;;344    		LCD_WR_REG(lcddev.setycmd); 
0004ee  49d3              LDR      r1,|L1.2108|
0004f0  7a48              LDRB     r0,[r1,#9]  ; lcddev
0004f2  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WR_REG
;;;345    		LCD_WR_DATA(y>>8); 
0004f6  1220              ASRS     r0,r4,#8
0004f8  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WR_DATA
;;;346    		LCD_WR_DATA(y&0XFF);
0004fc  b2e0              UXTB     r0,r4
0004fe  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WR_DATA
000502  e012              B        |L1.1322|
                  |L1.1284|
;;;347    	}else
;;;348    	{
;;;349     		if(lcddev.dir==1)x=lcddev.width-1-x;//横屏其实就是调转x,y坐标
000504  48cd              LDR      r0,|L1.2108|
000506  7980              LDRB     r0,[r0,#6]  ; lcddev
000508  2801              CMP      r0,#1
00050a  d104              BNE      |L1.1302|
00050c  48cb              LDR      r0,|L1.2108|
00050e  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]  ; lcddev
000510  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1
000512  1ac0              SUBS     r0,r0,r3
000514  b283              UXTH     r3,r0
                  |L1.1302|
;;;350    		LCD_WriteReg(lcddev.setxcmd,x);
000516  49c9              LDR      r1,|L1.2108|
000518  7a08              LDRB     r0,[r1,#8]  ; lcddev
00051a  4619              MOV      r1,r3
00051c  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;351    		LCD_WriteReg(lcddev.setycmd,y);
000520  49c6              LDR      r1,|L1.2108|
000522  7a48              LDRB     r0,[r1,#9]  ; lcddev
000524  4621              MOV      r1,r4
000526  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
                  |L1.1322|
;;;352    	}			 
;;;353    	LCD->LCD_REG=lcddev.wramcmd; 
00052a  48c4              LDR      r0,|L1.2108|
00052c  79c0              LDRB     r0,[r0,#7]  ; lcddev
00052e  49c5              LDR      r1,|L1.2116|
000530  1e89              SUBS     r1,r1,#2
000532  8008              STRH     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;354    	LCD->LCD_RAM=color; 
000534  f04f40d8          MOV      r0,#0x6c000000
000538  f8a05800          STRH     r5,[r0,#0x800]
;;;355    }	 
00053c  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
;;;356    
                          ENDP

                  LCD_Display_Dir PROC
;;;359    //dir:0,竖屏；1,横屏
;;;360    void LCD_Display_Dir(u8 dir)
00053e  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;361    {
000540  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;362    	if(dir==0)			//竖屏
000542  2c00              CMP      r4,#0
000544  d13d              BNE      |L1.1474|
;;;363    	{
;;;364    		lcddev.dir=0;	//竖屏
000546  49bd              LDR      r1,|L1.2108|
000548  7188              STRB     r0,[r1,#6]
;;;365    		lcddev.width=240;
00054a  20f0              MOVS     r0,#0xf0
00054c  8008              STRH     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;366    		lcddev.height=320;
00054e  f44f70a0          MOV      r0,#0x140
000552  8048              STRH     r0,[r1,#2]
;;;367    		if(lcddev.id==0X9341||lcddev.id==0X6804)
000554  4608              MOV      r0,r1
000556  8880              LDRH     r0,[r0,#4]  ; lcddev
000558  f5a04113          SUB      r1,r0,#0x9300
00055c  3941              SUBS     r1,r1,#0x41
00055e  d005              BEQ      |L1.1388|
000560  48b6              LDR      r0,|L1.2108|
000562  8880              LDRH     r0,[r0,#4]  ; lcddev
000564  f5a041d0          SUB      r1,r0,#0x6800
000568  3904              SUBS     r1,#4
00056a  d114              BNE      |L1.1430|
                  |L1.1388|
;;;368    		{
;;;369    			lcddev.wramcmd=0X2C;
00056c  202c              MOVS     r0,#0x2c
00056e  49b3              LDR      r1,|L1.2108|
000570  71c8              STRB     r0,[r1,#7]
;;;370    	 		lcddev.setxcmd=0X2A;
000572  202a              MOVS     r0,#0x2a
000574  7208              STRB     r0,[r1,#8]
;;;371    			lcddev.setycmd=0X2B;  	 
000576  202b              MOVS     r0,#0x2b
000578  7248              STRB     r0,[r1,#9]
;;;372    			if(lcddev.id==0X6804)
00057a  4608              MOV      r0,r1
00057c  8880              LDRH     r0,[r0,#4]  ; lcddev
00057e  f5a041d0          SUB      r1,r0,#0x6800
000582  3904              SUBS     r1,#4
000584  d15c              BNE      |L1.1600|
;;;373    			{
;;;374    				lcddev.width=320;
000586  f44f70a0          MOV      r0,#0x140
00058a  49ac              LDR      r1,|L1.2108|
00058c  8008              STRH     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;375    				lcddev.height=480;
00058e  f44f70f0          MOV      r0,#0x1e0
000592  8048              STRH     r0,[r1,#2]
000594  e054              B        |L1.1600|
                  |L1.1430|
;;;376    			}
;;;377    		}else if(lcddev.id==0X8989)
000596  48a9              LDR      r0,|L1.2108|
000598  8880              LDRH     r0,[r0,#4]  ; lcddev
00059a  f5a04109          SUB      r1,r0,#0x8900
00059e  3989              SUBS     r1,r1,#0x89
0005a0  d107              BNE      |L1.1458|
;;;378    		{
;;;379    			lcddev.wramcmd=R34;
0005a2  2022              MOVS     r0,#0x22
0005a4  49a5              LDR      r1,|L1.2108|
0005a6  71c8              STRB     r0,[r1,#7]
;;;380    	 		lcddev.setxcmd=0X4E;
0005a8  204e              MOVS     r0,#0x4e
0005aa  7208              STRB     r0,[r1,#8]
;;;381    			lcddev.setycmd=0X4F;  
0005ac  204f              MOVS     r0,#0x4f
0005ae  7248              STRB     r0,[r1,#9]
0005b0  e046              B        |L1.1600|
                  |L1.1458|
;;;382    		}else
;;;383    		{
;;;384    			lcddev.wramcmd=R34;
0005b2  2022              MOVS     r0,#0x22
0005b4  49a1              LDR      r1,|L1.2108|
0005b6  71c8              STRB     r0,[r1,#7]
;;;385    	 		lcddev.setxcmd=R32;
0005b8  2020              MOVS     r0,#0x20
0005ba  7208              STRB     r0,[r1,#8]
;;;386    			lcddev.setycmd=R33;  
0005bc  2021              MOVS     r0,#0x21
0005be  7248              STRB     r0,[r1,#9]
0005c0  e03e              B        |L1.1600|
                  |L1.1474|
;;;387    		}
;;;388    	}else 				//横屏
;;;389    	{	  				
;;;390    		lcddev.dir=1;	//横屏
0005c2  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
0005c4  499d              LDR      r1,|L1.2108|
0005c6  7188              STRB     r0,[r1,#6]
;;;391    		lcddev.width=320;
0005c8  f44f70a0          MOV      r0,#0x140
0005cc  8008              STRH     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;392    		lcddev.height=240;
0005ce  20f0              MOVS     r0,#0xf0
0005d0  8048              STRH     r0,[r1,#2]
;;;393    		if(lcddev.id==0X9341)
0005d2  4608              MOV      r0,r1
0005d4  8880              LDRH     r0,[r0,#4]  ; lcddev
0005d6  f5a04113          SUB      r1,r0,#0x9300
0005da  3941              SUBS     r1,r1,#0x41
0005dc  d107              BNE      |L1.1518|
;;;394    		{
;;;395    			lcddev.wramcmd=0X2C;
0005de  202c              MOVS     r0,#0x2c
0005e0  4996              LDR      r1,|L1.2108|
0005e2  71c8              STRB     r0,[r1,#7]
;;;396    	 		lcddev.setxcmd=0X2A;
0005e4  202a              MOVS     r0,#0x2a
0005e6  7208              STRB     r0,[r1,#8]
;;;397    			lcddev.setycmd=0X2B;  	 
0005e8  202b              MOVS     r0,#0x2b
0005ea  7248              STRB     r0,[r1,#9]
0005ec  e028              B        |L1.1600|
                  |L1.1518|
;;;398    		}else if(lcddev.id==0X6804)	 
0005ee  4893              LDR      r0,|L1.2108|
0005f0  8880              LDRH     r0,[r0,#4]  ; lcddev
0005f2  f5a041d0          SUB      r1,r0,#0x6800
0005f6  3904              SUBS     r1,#4
0005f8  d10d              BNE      |L1.1558|
;;;399    		{
;;;400     			lcddev.wramcmd=0X2C;
0005fa  202c              MOVS     r0,#0x2c
0005fc  498f              LDR      r1,|L1.2108|
0005fe  71c8              STRB     r0,[r1,#7]
;;;401    	 		lcddev.setxcmd=0X2B;
000600  202b              MOVS     r0,#0x2b
000602  7208              STRB     r0,[r1,#8]
;;;402    			lcddev.setycmd=0X2A;  	 
000604  202a              MOVS     r0,#0x2a
000606  7248              STRB     r0,[r1,#9]
;;;403    			lcddev.width=480;
000608  f44f70f0          MOV      r0,#0x1e0
00060c  8008              STRH     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;404    			lcddev.height=320; 
00060e  f44f70a0          MOV      r0,#0x140
000612  8048              STRH     r0,[r1,#2]
000614  e014              B        |L1.1600|
                  |L1.1558|
;;;405    		}else if(lcddev.id==0X8989)
000616  4889              LDR      r0,|L1.2108|
000618  8880              LDRH     r0,[r0,#4]  ; lcddev
00061a  f5a04109          SUB      r1,r0,#0x8900
00061e  3989              SUBS     r1,r1,#0x89
000620  d107              BNE      |L1.1586|
;;;406    		{
;;;407    			lcddev.wramcmd=R34;
000622  2022              MOVS     r0,#0x22
000624  4985              LDR      r1,|L1.2108|
000626  71c8              STRB     r0,[r1,#7]
;;;408    	 		lcddev.setxcmd=0X4F;
000628  204f              MOVS     r0,#0x4f
00062a  7208              STRB     r0,[r1,#8]
;;;409    			lcddev.setycmd=0X4E;   
00062c  204e              MOVS     r0,#0x4e
00062e  7248              STRB     r0,[r1,#9]
000630  e006              B        |L1.1600|
                  |L1.1586|
;;;410    		}else
;;;411    		{
;;;412    			lcddev.wramcmd=R34;
000632  2022              MOVS     r0,#0x22
000634  4981              LDR      r1,|L1.2108|
000636  71c8              STRB     r0,[r1,#7]
;;;413    	 		lcddev.setxcmd=R33;
000638  2021              MOVS     r0,#0x21
00063a  7208              STRB     r0,[r1,#8]
;;;414    			lcddev.setycmd=R32;  
00063c  2020              MOVS     r0,#0x20
00063e  7248              STRB     r0,[r1,#9]
                  |L1.1600|
;;;415    		}
;;;416    	} 
;;;417    	LCD_Scan_Dir(DFT_SCAN_DIR);	//默认扫描方向
000640  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
000642  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_Scan_Dir
;;;418    }	 
000646  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;419    //初始化lcd
                          ENDP

                  LCD_Clear PROC
;;;1295   //color:要清屏的填充色
;;;1296   void LCD_Clear(u16 color)
000648  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;1297   {
00064a  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;1298   	u32 index=0;      
00064c  2600              MOVS     r6,#0
;;;1299   	u32 totalpoint=lcddev.width;
00064e  487b              LDR      r0,|L1.2108|
000650  8805              LDRH     r5,[r0,#0]  ; lcddev
;;;1300   	totalpoint*=lcddev.height; 			//得到总点数
000652  8840              LDRH     r0,[r0,#2]  ; lcddev
000654  4345              MULS     r5,r0,r5
;;;1301   	if((lcddev.id==0X6804)&&(lcddev.dir==1))//6804横屏的时候特殊处理  
000656  4879              LDR      r0,|L1.2108|
000658  8880              LDRH     r0,[r0,#4]  ; lcddev
00065a  f5a041d0          SUB      r1,r0,#0x6800
00065e  3904              SUBS     r1,#4
000660  d116              BNE      |L1.1680|
000662  4876              LDR      r0,|L1.2108|
000664  7980              LDRB     r0,[r0,#6]  ; lcddev
000666  2801              CMP      r0,#1
000668  d112              BNE      |L1.1680|
;;;1302   	{						    
;;;1303    		lcddev.dir=0;	 
00066a  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
00066c  4973              LDR      r1,|L1.2108|
00066e  7188              STRB     r0,[r1,#6]
;;;1304    		lcddev.setxcmd=0X2A;
000670  202a              MOVS     r0,#0x2a
000672  7208              STRB     r0,[r1,#8]
;;;1305   		lcddev.setycmd=0X2B;  	 			
000674  202b              MOVS     r0,#0x2b
000676  7248              STRB     r0,[r1,#9]
;;;1306   		LCD_SetCursor(0x00,0x0000);		//设置光标位置  
000678  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
00067a  4608              MOV      r0,r1
00067c  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_SetCursor
;;;1307    		lcddev.dir=1;	 
000680  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
000682  496e              LDR      r1,|L1.2108|
000684  7188              STRB     r0,[r1,#6]
;;;1308     		lcddev.setxcmd=0X2B;
000686  202b              MOVS     r0,#0x2b
000688  7208              STRB     r0,[r1,#8]
;;;1309   		lcddev.setycmd=0X2A;  	 
00068a  202a              MOVS     r0,#0x2a
00068c  7248              STRB     r0,[r1,#9]
00068e  e003              B        |L1.1688|
                  |L1.1680|
;;;1310    	}else LCD_SetCursor(0x00,0x0000);	//设置光标位置 
000690  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
000692  4608              MOV      r0,r1
000694  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_SetCursor
                  |L1.1688|
;;;1311   	LCD_WriteRAM_Prepare();     		//开始写入GRAM	 	  
000698  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteRAM_Prepare
;;;1312   	for(index=0;index<totalpoint;index++)
00069c  2600              MOVS     r6,#0
00069e  e002              B        |L1.1702|
                  |L1.1696|
;;;1313   	{
;;;1314   		LCD->LCD_RAM=color;	   
0006a0  4868              LDR      r0,|L1.2116|
0006a2  8004              STRH     r4,[r0,#0]
0006a4  1c76              ADDS     r6,r6,#1              ;1312
                  |L1.1702|
0006a6  42ae              CMP      r6,r5                 ;1312
0006a8  d3fa              BCC      |L1.1696|
;;;1315   	}
;;;1316   }  
0006aa  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
;;;1317   //在指定区域内填充单个颜色
                          ENDP

                  LCD_Init PROC
;;;421    //在其他型号的驱动芯片上没有测试! 
;;;422    void LCD_Init(void)
0006ac  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;423    { 										  
;;;424    	RCC->AHBENR|=1<<8;     	 	//使能FSMC时钟	  
0006ae  4866              LDR      r0,|L1.2120|
0006b0  6940              LDR      r0,[r0,#0x14]
0006b2  f4407080          ORR      r0,r0,#0x100
0006b6  4964              LDR      r1,|L1.2120|
0006b8  6148              STR      r0,[r1,#0x14]
;;;425      	RCC->APB2ENR|=1<<3;     	//使能PORTB时钟
0006ba  4608              MOV      r0,r1
0006bc  6980              LDR      r0,[r0,#0x18]
0006be  f0400008          ORR      r0,r0,#8
0006c2  6188              STR      r0,[r1,#0x18]
;;;426    	RCC->APB2ENR|=1<<5;     	//使能PORTD时钟
0006c4  4608              MOV      r0,r1
0006c6  6980              LDR      r0,[r0,#0x18]
0006c8  f0400020          ORR      r0,r0,#0x20
0006cc  6188              STR      r0,[r1,#0x18]
;;;427    	RCC->APB2ENR|=1<<6;     	//使能PORTE时钟
0006ce  4608              MOV      r0,r1
0006d0  6980              LDR      r0,[r0,#0x18]
0006d2  f0400040          ORR      r0,r0,#0x40
0006d6  6188              STR      r0,[r1,#0x18]
;;;428     	RCC->APB2ENR|=1<<8;      	//使能PORTG时钟	 
0006d8  4608              MOV      r0,r1
0006da  6980              LDR      r0,[r0,#0x18]
0006dc  f4407080          ORR      r0,r0,#0x100
0006e0  6188              STR      r0,[r1,#0x18]
;;;429    	GPIOB->CRL&=0XFFFFFFF0;		//PB0 推挽输出 背光
0006e2  485a              LDR      r0,|L1.2124|
0006e4  6800              LDR      r0,[r0,#0]
0006e6  f020000f          BIC      r0,r0,#0xf
0006ea  4959              LDR      r1,|L1.2128|
0006ec  f8c10c00          STR      r0,[r1,#0xc00]
;;;430    	GPIOB->CRL|=0X00000003;	   
0006f0  4608              MOV      r0,r1
0006f2  f8d00c00          LDR      r0,[r0,#0xc00]
0006f6  f0400003          ORR      r0,r0,#3
0006fa  f8c10c00          STR      r0,[r1,#0xc00]
;;;431    	//PORTD复用推挽输出 	
;;;432    	GPIOD->CRH&=0X00FFF000;
0006fe  4855              LDR      r0,|L1.2132|
000700  6800              LDR      r0,[r0,#0]
000702  4955              LDR      r1,|L1.2136|
000704  4008              ANDS     r0,r0,r1
000706  4955              LDR      r1,|L1.2140|
000708  f8c10404          STR      r0,[r1,#0x404]
;;;433    	GPIOD->CRH|=0XBB000BBB; 
00070c  4851              LDR      r0,|L1.2132|
00070e  6800              LDR      r0,[r0,#0]
000710  4953              LDR      r1,|L1.2144|
000712  4308              ORRS     r0,r0,r1
000714  4951              LDR      r1,|L1.2140|
000716  f8c10404          STR      r0,[r1,#0x404]
;;;434    	GPIOD->CRL&=0XFF00FF00;
00071a  4608              MOV      r0,r1
00071c  f8d00400          LDR      r0,[r0,#0x400]
000720  f00020ff          AND      r0,r0,#0xff00ff00
000724  f8c10400          STR      r0,[r1,#0x400]
;;;435    	GPIOD->CRL|=0X00BB00BB;   	 
000728  4608              MOV      r0,r1
00072a  f8d00400          LDR      r0,[r0,#0x400]
00072e  f04010bb          ORR      r0,r0,#0xbb00bb
000732  f8c10400          STR      r0,[r1,#0x400]
;;;436    	//PORTE复用推挽输出 	
;;;437    	GPIOE->CRH&=0X00000000;
000736  4608              MOV      r0,r1
000738  f8d00804          LDR      r0,[r0,#0x804]
00073c  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
00073e  f8c10804          STR      r0,[r1,#0x804]
;;;438    	GPIOE->CRH|=0XBBBBBBBB; 
000742  4608              MOV      r0,r1
000744  f8d00804          LDR      r0,[r0,#0x804]
000748  f04030bb          ORR      r0,r0,#0xbbbbbbbb
00074c  f8c10804          STR      r0,[r1,#0x804]
;;;439    	GPIOE->CRL&=0X0FFFFFFF;
000750  4608              MOV      r0,r1
000752  f8d00800          LDR      r0,[r0,#0x800]
000756  f0204070          BIC      r0,r0,#0xf0000000
00075a  f8c10800          STR      r0,[r1,#0x800]
;;;440    	GPIOE->CRL|=0XB0000000;    	    	 											 
00075e  4608              MOV      r0,r1
000760  f8d00800          LDR      r0,[r0,#0x800]
000764  f0404030          ORR      r0,r0,#0xb0000000
000768  f8c10800          STR      r0,[r1,#0x800]
;;;441    	//PORTG12复用推挽输出 A0	    	 											 
;;;442    	GPIOG->CRH&=0XFFF0FFFF;
00076c  483d              LDR      r0,|L1.2148|
00076e  6840              LDR      r0,[r0,#4]
000770  f4202070          BIC      r0,r0,#0xf0000
000774  493b              LDR      r1,|L1.2148|
000776  6048              STR      r0,[r1,#4]
;;;443    	GPIOG->CRH|=0X000B0000; 
000778  4608              MOV      r0,r1
00077a  6840              LDR      r0,[r0,#4]
00077c  f4402030          ORR      r0,r0,#0xb0000
000780  6048              STR      r0,[r1,#4]
;;;444    	GPIOG->CRL&=0XFFFFFFF0;//PG0->RS
000782  4608              MOV      r0,r1
000784  6800              LDR      r0,[r0,#0]
000786  f020000f          BIC      r0,r0,#0xf
00078a  6008              STR      r0,[r1,#0]
;;;445    	GPIOG->CRL|=0X0000000B;  
00078c  4608              MOV      r0,r1
00078e  6800              LDR      r0,[r0,#0]
000790  f040000b          ORR      r0,r0,#0xb
000794  6008              STR      r0,[r1,#0]
;;;446    
;;;447    	//寄存器清零
;;;448    	//bank1有NE1~4,每一个有一个BCR+TCR，所以总共八个寄存器。
;;;449    	//这里我们使用NE4 ，也就对应BTCR[6],[7]。				    
;;;450    	FSMC_Bank1->BTCR[6]=0X00000000;
000796  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
000798  f04f4120          MOV      r1,#0xa0000000
00079c  6188              STR      r0,[r1,#0x18]
;;;451    	FSMC_Bank1->BTCR[7]=0X00000000;
00079e  61c8              STR      r0,[r1,#0x1c]
;;;452    	FSMC_Bank1E->BWTR[6]=0X00000000;
0007a0  f8c1011c          STR      r0,[r1,#0x11c]
;;;453    	//操作BCR寄存器	使用异步模式
;;;454    	FSMC_Bank1->BTCR[6]|=1<<12;		//存储器写使能
0007a4  4608              MOV      r0,r1
0007a6  6980              LDR      r0,[r0,#0x18]
0007a8  f4405080          ORR      r0,r0,#0x1000
0007ac  6188              STR      r0,[r1,#0x18]
;;;455    	FSMC_Bank1->BTCR[6]|=1<<14;		//读写使用不同的时序
0007ae  4608              MOV      r0,r1
0007b0  6980              LDR      r0,[r0,#0x18]
0007b2  f4404080          ORR      r0,r0,#0x4000
0007b6  6188              STR      r0,[r1,#0x18]
;;;456    	FSMC_Bank1->BTCR[6]|=1<<4; 		//存储器数据宽度为16bit 	    
0007b8  4608              MOV      r0,r1
0007ba  6980              LDR      r0,[r0,#0x18]
0007bc  f0400010          ORR      r0,r0,#0x10
0007c0  6188              STR      r0,[r1,#0x18]
;;;457    	//操作BTR寄存器	
;;;458    	//读时序控制寄存器 							    
;;;459    	FSMC_Bank1->BTCR[7]|=0<<28;		//模式A 	 							  	 
0007c2  4608              MOV      r0,r1
0007c4  69c0              LDR      r0,[r0,#0x1c]
0007c6  61c8              STR      r0,[r1,#0x1c]
;;;460    	FSMC_Bank1->BTCR[7]|=1<<0; 		//地址建立时间（ADDSET）为2个HCLK 1/36M=27ns	 	 
0007c8  4608              MOV      r0,r1
0007ca  69c0              LDR      r0,[r0,#0x1c]
0007cc  f0400001          ORR      r0,r0,#1
0007d0  61c8              STR      r0,[r1,#0x1c]
;;;461    	//因为液晶驱动IC的读数据的时候，速度不能太快，尤其对1289这个IC。
;;;462    	FSMC_Bank1->BTCR[7]|=0XF<<8;  	//数据保存时间为16个HCLK	 	 
0007d2  4608              MOV      r0,r1
0007d4  69c0              LDR      r0,[r0,#0x1c]
0007d6  f4406070          ORR      r0,r0,#0xf00
0007da  61c8              STR      r0,[r1,#0x1c]
;;;463    	//写时序控制寄存器  
;;;464    	FSMC_Bank1E->BWTR[6]|=0<<28; 	//模式A 	 							    
0007dc  4608              MOV      r0,r1
0007de  f8d0011c          LDR      r0,[r0,#0x11c]
0007e2  f8c1011c          STR      r0,[r1,#0x11c]
;;;465    	FSMC_Bank1E->BWTR[6]|=0<<0;		//地址建立时间（ADDSET）为1个HCLK 
0007e6  4608              MOV      r0,r1
0007e8  f8d0011c          LDR      r0,[r0,#0x11c]
0007ec  f8c1011c          STR      r0,[r1,#0x11c]
;;;466     	//4个HCLK（HCLK=72M）因为液晶驱动IC的写信号脉宽，最少也得50ns。72M/4=24M=55ns  	 
;;;467    	FSMC_Bank1E->BWTR[6]|=3<<8; 	//数据保存时间为4个HCLK	
0007f0  4608              MOV      r0,r1
0007f2  f8d0011c          LDR      r0,[r0,#0x11c]
0007f6  f4407040          ORR      r0,r0,#0x300
0007fa  f8c1011c          STR      r0,[r1,#0x11c]
;;;468    	//使能BANK1,区域4
;;;469    	FSMC_Bank1->BTCR[6]|=1<<0;		//使能BANK1，区域4	  
0007fe  4608              MOV      r0,r1
000800  6980              LDR      r0,[r0,#0x18]
000802  f0400001          ORR      r0,r0,#1
000806  6188              STR      r0,[r1,#0x18]
;;;470    			 
;;;471     	delay_ms(50); // delay 50 ms 
000808  2032              MOVS     r0,#0x32
00080a  f7fffffe          BL       delay_ms
;;;472     	LCD_WriteReg(0x0000,0x0001);
00080e  2101              MOVS     r1,#1
000810  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
000812  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;473    	delay_ms(50); // delay 50 ms 
000816  2032              MOVS     r0,#0x32
000818  f7fffffe          BL       delay_ms
;;;474      	lcddev.id = LCD_ReadReg(0x0000);   
00081c  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
00081e  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_ReadReg
000822  4906              LDR      r1,|L1.2108|
000824  8088              STRH     r0,[r1,#4]
;;;475      	if(lcddev.id<0XFF||lcddev.id==0XFFFF||lcddev.id==0X9300)//读到ID不正确,新增lcddev.id==0X9300判断，因为9341在未被复位的情况下会被读成9300
000826  4608              MOV      r0,r1
000828  8880              LDRH     r0,[r0,#4]  ; lcddev
00082a  28ff              CMP      r0,#0xff
00082c  db21              BLT      |L1.2162|
00082e  4608              MOV      r0,r1
000830  8880              LDRH     r0,[r0,#4]  ; lcddev
000832  f5a0417f          SUB      r1,r0,#0xff00
000836  39ff              SUBS     r1,r1,#0xff
000838  d01b              BEQ      |L1.2162|
00083a  e015              B        |L1.2152|
                  |L1.2108|
                          DCD      lcddev
                  |L1.2112|
                          DCD      POINT_COLOR
                  |L1.2116|
                          DCD      0x6c000800
                  |L1.2120|
                          DCD      0x40021000
                  |L1.2124|
                          DCD      0x40010c00
                  |L1.2128|
                          DCD      0x40010000
                  |L1.2132|
                          DCD      0x40011404
                  |L1.2136|
                          DCD      0x00fff000
                  |L1.2140|
                          DCD      0x40011000
                  |L1.2144|
                          DCD      0xbb000bbb
                  |L1.2148|
                          DCD      0x40012000
                  |L1.2152|
000868  48ff              LDR      r0,|L1.3176|
00086a  8880              LDRH     r0,[r0,#4]  ; lcddev
00086c  f5b04f13          CMP      r0,#0x9300
000870  d145              BNE      |L1.2302|
                  |L1.2162|
;;;476    	{	
;;;477     		//尝试9341 ID的读取		
;;;478    		LCD_WR_REG(0XD3);				   
000872  20d3              MOVS     r0,#0xd3
000874  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WR_REG
;;;479    		LCD_RD_DATA(); 				//dummy read 	
000878  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_RD_DATA
;;;480     		LCD_RD_DATA();   	    	//读到0X00
00087c  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_RD_DATA
;;;481      		lcddev.id=LCD_RD_DATA();   	//读取93								   
000880  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_RD_DATA
000884  49f8              LDR      r1,|L1.3176|
000886  8088              STRH     r0,[r1,#4]
;;;482     		lcddev.id<<=8;
000888  4608              MOV      r0,r1
00088a  8880              LDRH     r0,[r0,#4]  ; lcddev
00088c  0600              LSLS     r0,r0,#24
00088e  0c00              LSRS     r0,r0,#16
000890  8088              STRH     r0,[r1,#4]
;;;483    		lcddev.id|=LCD_RD_DATA();  	//读取41 	   			   
000892  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_RD_DATA
000896  49f4              LDR      r1,|L1.3176|
000898  8889              LDRH     r1,[r1,#4]  ; lcddev
00089a  4308              ORRS     r0,r0,r1
00089c  49f2              LDR      r1,|L1.3176|
00089e  8088              STRH     r0,[r1,#4]
;;;484     		if(lcddev.id!=0X9341)		//非9341,尝试是不是6804
0008a0  4608              MOV      r0,r1
0008a2  8880              LDRH     r0,[r0,#4]  ; lcddev
0008a4  f5a04113          SUB      r1,r0,#0x9300
0008a8  3941              SUBS     r1,r1,#0x41
0008aa  d018              BEQ      |L1.2270|
;;;485    		{	
;;;486     			LCD_WR_REG(0XBF);				   
0008ac  20bf              MOVS     r0,#0xbf
0008ae  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WR_REG
;;;487    			LCD_RD_DATA(); 			//dummy read 	 
0008b2  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_RD_DATA
;;;488    	 		LCD_RD_DATA();   	    //读回0X01			   
0008b6  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_RD_DATA
;;;489    	 		LCD_RD_DATA(); 			//读回0XD0 			  	
0008ba  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_RD_DATA
;;;490    	  		lcddev.id=LCD_RD_DATA();//这里读回0X68 
0008be  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_RD_DATA
0008c2  49e9              LDR      r1,|L1.3176|
0008c4  8088              STRH     r0,[r1,#4]
;;;491    			lcddev.id<<=8;
0008c6  4608              MOV      r0,r1
0008c8  8880              LDRH     r0,[r0,#4]  ; lcddev
0008ca  0600              LSLS     r0,r0,#24
0008cc  0c00              LSRS     r0,r0,#16
0008ce  8088              STRH     r0,[r1,#4]
;;;492    	  		lcddev.id|=LCD_RD_DATA();//这里读回0X04	   	  
0008d0  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_RD_DATA
0008d4  49e4              LDR      r1,|L1.3176|
0008d6  8889              LDRH     r1,[r1,#4]  ; lcddev
0008d8  4308              ORRS     r0,r0,r1
0008da  49e3              LDR      r1,|L1.3176|
0008dc  8088              STRH     r0,[r1,#4]
                  |L1.2270|
;;;493     		} 
;;;494    		if(lcddev.id!=0X9341&&lcddev.id!=0X6804)lcddev.id=0x9341;//新增，用于识别9341 	     
0008de  48e2              LDR      r0,|L1.3176|
0008e0  8880              LDRH     r0,[r0,#4]  ; lcddev
0008e2  f5a04113          SUB      r1,r0,#0x9300
0008e6  3941              SUBS     r1,r1,#0x41
0008e8  d009              BEQ      |L1.2302|
0008ea  48df              LDR      r0,|L1.3176|
0008ec  8880              LDRH     r0,[r0,#4]  ; lcddev
0008ee  f5a041d0          SUB      r1,r0,#0x6800
0008f2  3904              SUBS     r1,#4
0008f4  d003              BEQ      |L1.2302|
0008f6  f2493041          MOV      r0,#0x9341
0008fa  49db              LDR      r1,|L1.3176|
0008fc  8088              STRH     r0,[r1,#4]
                  |L1.2302|
;;;495    	}
;;;496     	printf(" LCD ID:%x\r\n",lcddev.id); //打印LCD ID  
0008fe  48da              LDR      r0,|L1.3176|
000900  8881              LDRH     r1,[r0,#4]  ; lcddev
000902  a0da              ADR      r0,|L1.3180|
000904  f7fffffe          BL       __2printf
;;;497    	if(lcddev.id==0X9341)	//9341初始化
000908  48d7              LDR      r0,|L1.3176|
00090a  8880              LDRH     r0,[r0,#4]  ; lcddev
00090c  f5a04113          SUB      r1,r0,#0x9300
000910  3941              SUBS     r1,r1,#0x41
000912  d17e              BNE      |L1.2578|
;;;498    	{	 
;;;499    		LCD_WR_REG(0xCF);  
000914  20cf              MOVS     r0,#0xcf
000916  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WR_REG
;;;500    		LCD_WR_DATA(0x00); 
00091a  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
00091c  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WR_DATA
;;;501    		LCD_WR_DATA(0xC1); 
000920  20c1              MOVS     r0,#0xc1
000922  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WR_DATA
;;;502    		LCD_WR_DATA(0X30); 
000926  2030              MOVS     r0,#0x30
000928  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WR_DATA
;;;503    		LCD_WR_REG(0xED);  
00092c  20ed              MOVS     r0,#0xed
00092e  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WR_REG
;;;504    		LCD_WR_DATA(0x64); 
000932  2064              MOVS     r0,#0x64
000934  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WR_DATA
;;;505    		LCD_WR_DATA(0x03); 
000938  2003              MOVS     r0,#3
00093a  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WR_DATA
;;;506    		LCD_WR_DATA(0X12); 
00093e  2012              MOVS     r0,#0x12
000940  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WR_DATA
;;;507    		LCD_WR_DATA(0X81); 
000944  2081              MOVS     r0,#0x81
000946  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WR_DATA
;;;508    		LCD_WR_REG(0xE8);  
00094a  20e8              MOVS     r0,#0xe8
00094c  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WR_REG
;;;509    		LCD_WR_DATA(0x85); 
000950  2085              MOVS     r0,#0x85
000952  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WR_DATA
;;;510    		LCD_WR_DATA(0x10); 
000956  2010              MOVS     r0,#0x10
000958  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WR_DATA
;;;511    		LCD_WR_DATA(0x7A); 
00095c  207a              MOVS     r0,#0x7a
00095e  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WR_DATA
;;;512    		LCD_WR_REG(0xCB);  
000962  20cb              MOVS     r0,#0xcb
000964  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WR_REG
;;;513    		LCD_WR_DATA(0x39); 
000968  2039              MOVS     r0,#0x39
00096a  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WR_DATA
;;;514    		LCD_WR_DATA(0x2C); 
00096e  202c              MOVS     r0,#0x2c
000970  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WR_DATA
;;;515    		LCD_WR_DATA(0x00); 
000974  2000              MOVS     r0,#0

;;;516    		LCD_WR_DATA(0x34); 
00097a  2034              MOVS     r0,#0x34
00097c  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WR_DATA
;;;517    		LCD_WR_DATA(0x02); 
000980  2002              MOVS     r0,#2

;;;518    		LCD_WR_REG(0xF7);

;;;519    		LCD_WR_DATA(0x20); 
00098c  2020              MOVS     r0,#0x20

;;;520    		LCD_WR_REG(0xEA);

;;;521    		LCD_WR_DATA(0x00);

;;;522    		LCD_WR_DATA(0x00);

;;;523    		LCD_WR_REG(0xC0);    //Power control 
0009a4  20c0              MOVS     r0,#0xc0

;;;524    		LCD_WR_DATA(0x1B);   //VRH[5:0]

;;;527    		LCD_WR_REG(0xC5);    //VCM control

                  |L1.2578|

                  |L1.2580|

000de4  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;700    		//ram
;;;701    		LCD_WriteReg(0x0050,0x0000); 
000de8  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
000dea  2050              MOVS     r0,#0x50
000dec  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;702    		LCD_WriteReg(0x0051,0x00EF);
000df0  21ef              MOVS     r1,#0xef
000df2  2051              MOVS     r0,#0x51
000df4  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;703    		LCD_WriteReg(0x0052,0x0000);

000dfa  2052              MOVS     r0,#0x52

000e04  2053              MOVS     r0,#0x53
000e06  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;705    		LCD_WriteReg(0x0060,0xA700);

;;;721    	}else if(lcddev.id==0x9328)//ILI9328   OK

;;;722    	{
;;;723      		LCD_WriteReg(0x00EC,0x108F);// internal timeing

;;;724     		LCD_WriteReg(0x00EF,0x1234);// ADD        
000e90  f2412134          MOV      r1,#0x1234
000e94  20ef              MOVS     r0,#0xef
000e96  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;725    		//LCD_WriteReg(0x00e7,0x0010);      
;;;726            //LCD_WriteReg(0x0000,0x0001);//开启内部时钟
;;;727            LCD_WriteReg(0x0001,0x0100);     
000e9a  f44f7180          MOV      r1,#0x100
000e9e  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
000ea0  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;728            LCD_WriteReg(0x0002,0x0700);//电源开启                    
000ea4  f44f61e0          MOV      r1,#0x700
000ea8  2002              MOVS     r0,#2
000eaa  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;729    		//LCD_WriteReg(0x0003,(1<<3)|(1<<4) ); 	//65K  RGB
;;;730    		//DRIVE TABLE(寄存器 03H)
;;;731    		//BIT3=AM BIT4:5=ID0:1
;;;732    		//AM ID0 ID1   FUNCATION
;;;733    		// 0  0   0	   R->L D->U
;;;734    		// 1  0   0	   D->U	R->L
;;;735    		// 0  1   0	   L->R D->U
;;;736    		// 1  1   0    D->U	L->R
;;;737    		// 0  0   1	   R->L U->D
;;;738    		// 1  0   1    U->D	R->L
;;;739    		// 0  1   1    L->R U->D 正常就用这个.
;;;740    		// 1  1   1	   U->D	L->R
;;;741            LCD_WriteReg(0x0003,(1<<12)|(3<<4)|(0<<3) );//65K    
000eae  f2410130          MOV      r1,#0x1030
000eb2  2003              MOVS     r0,#3
000eb4  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;742            LCD_WriteReg(0x0004,0x0000);                                   
000eb8  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
000eba  2004              MOVS     r0,#4
000ebc  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;743            LCD_WriteReg(0x0008,0x0202);

000ec4  2008              MOVS     r0,#8
000ec6  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;744            LCD_WriteReg(0x0009,0x0000);

000ecc  2009              MOVS     r0,#9
000ece  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg

000ed6  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;746            LCD_WriteReg(0x000c,0x0001);//display setting

000ede  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;747            LCD_WriteReg(0x000d,0x0000);//0f3c

;;;799    	}else if(lcddev.id==0x9320)//测试OK.

;;;800    	{
;;;801    		LCD_WriteReg(0x00,0x0000);
00107c  4608              MOV      r0,r1
00107e  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;802    		LCD_WriteReg(0x01,0x0100);	//Driver Output Contral.
001082  f44f7180          MOV      r1,#0x100
001086  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
001088  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;803    		LCD_WriteReg(0x02,0x0700);	//LCD Driver Waveform Contral.
00108c  f44f61e0          MOV      r1,#0x700
001090  2002              MOVS     r0,#2
001092  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;804    		LCD_WriteReg(0x03,0x1030);//Entry Mode Set.
001096  f2410130          MOV      r1,#0x1030
00109a  2003              MOVS     r0,#3
00109c  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;805    		//LCD_WriteReg(0x03,0x1018);	//Entry Mode Set.
;;;806    	
;;;807    		LCD_WriteReg(0x04,0x0000);	//Scalling Contral.
0010a0  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
0010a2  2004              MOVS     r0,#4
0010a4  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;808    		LCD_WriteReg(0x08,0x0202);	//Display Contral 2.(0x0207)
0010a8  f2402102          MOV      r1,#0x202
0010ac  2008              MOVS     r0,#8
0010ae  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;809    		LCD_WriteReg(0x09,0x0000);	//Display Contral 3.(0x0000)
0010b2  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
0010b4  2009              MOVS     r0,#9
0010b6  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;810    		LCD_WriteReg(0x0a,0x0000);	//Frame Cycle Contal.(0x0000)
0010ba  e001              B        |L1.4288|
                  |L1.4284|
                          DCD      lcddev
                  |L1.4288|
0010c0  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
0010c2  200a              MOVS     r0,#0xa

;;;811    		LCD_WriteReg(0x0c,(1<<0));	//Extern Display Interface Contral 1.(0x0000)
0010c8  2101              MOVS     r1,#1
0010ca  200c              MOVS     r0,#0xc
0010cc  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;812    		LCD_WriteReg(0x0d,0x0000);	//Frame Maker Position.
0010d0  2100              MOVS     r1,#0

0010d4  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;813    		LCD_WriteReg(0x0f,0x0000);	//Extern Display Interface Contral 2.

;;;814    		delay_ms(50); 
0010e0  2032              MOVS     r0,#0x32

;;;815    		LCD_WriteReg(0x07,0x0101);	//Display Contral.

0010ea  2007              MOVS     r0,#7

;;;816    		delay_ms(50);

0010f2  f7fffffe          BL       delay_ms
;;;817    		LCD_WriteReg(0x10,(1<<12)|(0<<8)|(1<<7)|(1<<6)|(0<<4));	//Power Control 1.(0x16b0)
0010f6  f44f5186          MOV      r1,#0x10c0
0010fa  2010              MOVS     r0,#0x10
0010fc  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;818    		LCD_WriteReg(0x11,0x0007);								//Power Control 2.(0x0001)
001100  2107              MOVS     r1,#7
001102  2011              MOVS     r0,#0x11
001104  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;819    		LCD_WriteReg(0x12,(1<<8)|(1<<4)|(0<<0));				//Power Control 3.(0x0138)
001108  f44f7188          MOV      r1,#0x110
00110c  2012              MOVS     r0,#0x12
00110e  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;820    		LCD_WriteReg(0x13,0x0b00);								//Power Control 4.
001112  f44f6130          MOV      r1,#0xb00
001116  2013              MOVS     r0,#0x13

;;;821    		LCD_WriteReg(0x29,0x0000);								//Power Control 7.
00111c  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
00111e  2029              MOVS     r0,#0x29
001120  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;822    	
;;;823    		LCD_WriteReg(0x2b,(1<<14)|(1<<4));	    
001124  f2440110          MOV      r1,#0x4010
001128  202b              MOVS     r0,#0x2b
00112a  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;824    		LCD_WriteReg(0x50,0);	//Set X Star
00112e  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
001130  2050              MOVS     r0,#0x50
001132  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;825    		//水平GRAM终止位置Set X End.
;;;826    		LCD_WriteReg(0x51,239);	//Set Y Star
001136  21ef              MOVS     r1,#0xef
001138  2051              MOVS     r0,#0x51
00113a  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;827    		LCD_WriteReg(0x52,0);	//Set Y End.t.
00113e  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
001140  2052              MOVS     r0,#0x52
001142  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;828    		LCD_WriteReg(0x53,319);	//
001146  f240113f          MOV      r1,#0x13f
00114a  2053              MOVS     r0,#0x53
00114c  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;829    	
;;;830    		LCD_WriteReg(0x60,0x2700);	//Driver Output Control.
001150  f44f511c          MOV      r1,#0x2700
001154  2060              MOVS     r0,#0x60
001156  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;831    		LCD_WriteReg(0x61,0x0001);	//Driver Output Control.
00115a  2101              MOVS     r1,#1
00115c  2061              MOVS     r0,#0x61
00115e  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;832    		LCD_WriteReg(0x6a,0x0000);	//Vertical Srcoll Control.
001162  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
001164  206a              MOVS     r0,#0x6a
001166  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;833    	
;;;834    		LCD_WriteReg(0x80,0x0000);	//Display Position? Partial Display 1.
00116a  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
00116c  2080              MOVS     r0,#0x80
00116e  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;835    		LCD_WriteReg(0x81,0x0000);	//RAM Address Start? Partial Display 1.
001172  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
001174  2081              MOVS     r0,#0x81
001176  e000              B        |L1.4474|
                  |L1.4472|
001178  e030              B        |L1.4572|
                  |L1.4474|
00117a  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;836    		LCD_WriteReg(0x82,0x0000);	//RAM Address End-Partial Display 1.
00117e  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
001180  2082              MOVS     r0,#0x82
001182  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;837    		LCD_WriteReg(0x83,0x0000);	//Displsy Position? Partial Display 2.
001186  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
001188  2083              MOVS     r0,#0x83
00118a  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;838    		LCD_WriteReg(0x84,0x0000);	//RAM Address Start? Partial Display 2.
00118e  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
001190  2084              MOVS     r0,#0x84
001192  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;839    		LCD_WriteReg(0x85,0x0000);	//RAM Address End? Partial Display 2.
001196  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
001198  2085              MOVS     r0,#0x85
00119a  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;840    	
;;;841    		LCD_WriteReg(0x90,(0<<7)|(16<<0));	//Frame Cycle Contral.(0x0013)
00119e  2110              MOVS     r1,#0x10
0011a0  2090              MOVS     r0,#0x90
0011a2  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;842    		LCD_WriteReg(0x92,0x0000);	//Panel Interface Contral 2.(0x0000)
0011a6  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
0011a8  2092              MOVS     r0,#0x92
0011aa  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;843    		LCD_WriteReg(0x93,0x0001);	//Panel Interface Contral 3.
0011ae  2101              MOVS     r1,#1
0011b0  2093              MOVS     r0,#0x93
0011b2  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;844    		LCD_WriteReg(0x95,0x0110);	//Frame Cycle Contral.(0x0110)
0011b6  f44f7188          MOV      r1,#0x110
0011ba  2095              MOVS     r0,#0x95
0011bc  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;845    		LCD_WriteReg(0x97,(0<<8));	//
0011c0  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
0011c2  2097              MOVS     r0,#0x97
0011c4  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;846    		LCD_WriteReg(0x98,0x0000);	//Frame Cycle Contral.	   
0011c8  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
0011ca  2098              MOVS     r0,#0x98
0011cc  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;847    		LCD_WriteReg(0x07,0x0173);	//(0x0173)
0011d0  f2401173          MOV      r1,#0x173
0011d4  2007              MOVS     r0,#7
0011d6  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
0011da  e4b1              B        |L1.2880|
                  |L1.4572|
;;;848    	}else if(lcddev.id==0X9331)//OK |/|/|			 
0011dc  48ff              LDR      r0,|L1.5596|
0011de  8880              LDRH     r0,[r0,#4]  ; lcddev
0011e0  f5a04113          SUB      r1,r0,#0x9300
0011e4  3931              SUBS     r1,r1,#0x31
0011e6  d17d              BNE      |L1.4836|
;;;849    	{
;;;850    		LCD_WriteReg(0x00E7, 0x1014);
0011e8  f2410114          MOV      r1,#0x1014
0011ec  20e7              MOVS     r0,#0xe7
0011ee  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;851    		LCD_WriteReg(0x0001, 0x0100); // set SS and SM bit
0011f2  f44f7180          MOV      r1,#0x100
0011f6  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
0011f8  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;852    		LCD_WriteReg(0x0002, 0x0200); // set 1 line inversion
0011fc  f44f7100          MOV      r1,#0x200
001200  2002              MOVS     r0,#2
001202  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;853            LCD_WriteReg(0x0003,(1<<12)|(3<<4)|(1<<3));//65K    
001206  f2410138          MOV      r1,#0x1038
00120a  2003              MOVS     r0,#3
00120c  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;854    		//LCD_WriteReg(0x0003, 0x1030); // set GRAM write direction and BGR=1.
;;;855    		LCD_WriteReg(0x0008, 0x0202); // set the back porch and front porch
001210  f2402102          MOV      r1,#0x202
001214  2008              MOVS     r0,#8
001216  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;856    		LCD_WriteReg(0x0009, 0x0000); // set non-display area refresh cycle ISC[3:0]
00121a  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
00121c  2009              MOVS     r0,#9
00121e  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;857    		LCD_WriteReg(0x000A, 0x0000); // FMARK function
001222  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
001224  200a              MOVS     r0,#0xa
001226  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;858    		LCD_WriteReg(0x000C, 0x0000); // RGB interface setting
00122a  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
00122c  200c              MOVS     r0,#0xc
00122e  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;859    		LCD_WriteReg(0x000D, 0x0000); // Frame marker Position
001232  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
001234  200d              MOVS     r0,#0xd
001236  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;860    		LCD_WriteReg(0x000F, 0x0000); // RGB interface polarity
00123a  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
00123c  200f              MOVS     r0,#0xf
00123e  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;861    		//*************Power On sequence ****************//
;;;862    		LCD_WriteReg(0x0010, 0x0000); // SAP, BT[3:0], AP, DSTB, SLP, STB
001242  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
001244  2010              MOVS     r0,#0x10
001246  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;863    		LCD_WriteReg(0x0011, 0x0007); // DC1[2:0], DC0[2:0], VC[2:0]
00124a  2107              MOVS     r1,#7
00124c  2011              MOVS     r0,#0x11
00124e  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;864    		LCD_WriteReg(0x0012, 0x0000); // VREG1OUT voltage
001252  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
001254  2012              MOVS     r0,#0x12
001256  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;865    		LCD_WriteReg(0x0013, 0x0000); // VDV[4:0] for VCOM amplitude
00125a  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
00125c  2013              MOVS     r0,#0x13
00125e  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;866    		delay_ms(200); // Dis-charge capacitor power voltage
001262  20c8              MOVS     r0,#0xc8
001264  f7fffffe          BL       delay_ms
;;;867    		LCD_WriteReg(0x0010, 0x1690); // SAP, BT[3:0], AP, DSTB, SLP, STB
001268  f2416190          MOV      r1,#0x1690
00126c  2010              MOVS     r0,#0x10
00126e  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;868    		LCD_WriteReg(0x0011, 0x0227); // DC1[2:0], DC0[2:0], VC[2:0]
001272  f2402127          MOV      r1,#0x227
001276  2011              MOVS     r0,#0x11
001278  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;869    		delay_ms(50); // Delay 50ms
00127c  2032              MOVS     r0,#0x32
00127e  f7fffffe          BL       delay_ms
;;;870    		LCD_WriteReg(0x0012, 0x000C); // Internal reference voltage= Vci;
001282  210c              MOVS     r1,#0xc
001284  2012              MOVS     r0,#0x12
001286  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;871    		delay_ms(50); // Delay 50ms
00128a  2032              MOVS     r0,#0x32
00128c  f7fffffe          BL       delay_ms
;;;872    		LCD_WriteReg(0x0013, 0x0800); // Set VDV[4:0] for VCOM amplitude
001290  f44f6100          MOV      r1,#0x800
001294  2013              MOVS     r0,#0x13
001296  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;873    		LCD_WriteReg(0x0029, 0x0011); // Set VCM[5:0] for VCOMH
00129a  2111              MOVS     r1,#0x11
00129c  2029              MOVS     r0,#0x29
00129e  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;874    		LCD_WriteReg(0x002B, 0x000B); // Set Frame Rate
0012a2  210b              MOVS     r1,#0xb
0012a4  202b              MOVS     r0,#0x2b
0012a6  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;875    		delay_ms(50); // Delay 50ms
0012aa  2032              MOVS     r0,#0x32
0012ac  f7fffffe          BL       delay_ms
;;;876    		LCD_WriteReg(0x0020, 0x0000); // GRAM horizontal Address
0012b0  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
0012b2  2020              MOVS     r0,#0x20
0012b4  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;877    		LCD_WriteReg(0x0021, 0x013f); // GRAM Vertical Address
0012b8  f240113f          MOV      r1,#0x13f
0012bc  2021              MOVS     r0,#0x21
0012be  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;878    		// ----------- Adjust the Gamma Curve ----------//
;;;879    		LCD_WriteReg(0x0030, 0x0000);
0012c2  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
0012c4  2030              MOVS     r0,#0x30
0012c6  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;880    		LCD_WriteReg(0x0031, 0x0106);
0012ca  f44f7183          MOV      r1,#0x106
0012ce  2031              MOVS     r0,#0x31
0012d0  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;881    		LCD_WriteReg(0x0032, 0x0000);
0012d4  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
0012d6  2032              MOVS     r0,#0x32
0012d8  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;882    		LCD_WriteReg(0x0035, 0x0204);
0012dc  f44f7101          MOV      r1,#0x204
0012e0  2035              MOVS     r0,#0x35
0012e2  e000              B        |L1.4838|
                  |L1.4836|
0012e4  e064              B        |L1.5040|
                  |L1.4838|
0012e6  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;883    		LCD_WriteReg(0x0036, 0x160A);
0012ea  f241610a          MOV      r1,#0x160a
0012ee  2036              MOVS     r0,#0x36
0012f0  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;884    		LCD_WriteReg(0x0037, 0x0707);

0012f8  2037              MOVS     r0,#0x37
0012fa  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;885    		LCD_WriteReg(0x0038, 0x0106);
0012fe  f44f7183          MOV      r1,#0x106
001302  2038              MOVS     r0,#0x38
001304  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;886    		LCD_WriteReg(0x0039, 0x0707);
001308  f2407107          MOV      r1,#0x707
00130c  2039              MOVS     r0,#0x39

;;;887    		LCD_WriteReg(0x003C, 0x0402);
001312  f2404102          MOV      r1,#0x402
001316  203c              MOVS     r0,#0x3c
001318  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;888    		LCD_WriteReg(0x003D, 0x0C0F);
00131c  f640410f          MOV      r1,#0xc0f
001320  203d              MOVS     r0,#0x3d
001322  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;889    		//------------------ Set GRAM area ---------------//
;;;890    		LCD_WriteReg(0x0050, 0x0000); // Horizontal GRAM Start Address
001326  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
001328  2050              MOVS     r0,#0x50
00132a  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;891    		LCD_WriteReg(0x0051, 0x00EF); // Horizontal GRAM End Address
00132e  21ef              MOVS     r1,#0xef
001330  2051              MOVS     r0,#0x51

;;;892    		LCD_WriteReg(0x0052, 0x0000); // Vertical GRAM Start Address
001336  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
001338  2052              MOVS     r0,#0x52
00133a  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;893    		LCD_WriteReg(0x0053, 0x013F); // Vertical GRAM Start Address

001342  2053              MOVS     r0,#0x53
001344  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;894    		LCD_WriteReg(0x0060, 0x2700); // Gate Scan Line
001348  f44f511c          MOV      r1,#0x2700
00134c  2060              MOVS     r0,#0x60
00134e  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;895    		LCD_WriteReg(0x0061, 0x0001); // NDL,VLE, REV 
001352  2101              MOVS     r1,#1
001354  2061              MOVS     r0,#0x61
001356  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;896    		LCD_WriteReg(0x006A, 0x0000); // set scrolling line
00135a  2100              MOVS     r1,#0

00135e  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;897    		//-------------- Partial Display Control ---------//
;;;898    		LCD_WriteReg(0x0080, 0x0000);

;;;899    		LCD_WriteReg(0x0081, 0x0000);
00136a  2100              MOVS     r1,#0

;;;900    		LCD_WriteReg(0x0082, 0x0000);
001372  2100              MOVS     r1,#0

;;;901    		LCD_WriteReg(0x0083, 0x0000);
00137a  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
00137c  2083              MOVS     r0,#0x83
00137e  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;902    		LCD_WriteReg(0x0084, 0x0000);
001382  2100              MOVS     r1,#0

;;;903    		LCD_WriteReg(0x0085, 0x0000);
00138a  2100              MOVS     r1,#0

00138e  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;904    		//-------------- Panel Control -------------------//
;;;905    		LCD_WriteReg(0x0090, 0x0010);
001392  2110              MOVS     r1,#0x10

;;;906    		LCD_WriteReg(0x0092, 0x0600);

;;;907    		LCD_WriteReg(0x0007, 0x0133); // 262K color and display ON
0013a4  f2401133          MOV      r1,#0x133
0013a8  2007              MOVS     r0,#7
0013aa  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
0013ae  e485              B        |L1.3260|
                  |L1.5040|
;;;908    	}else if(lcddev.id==0x5408)
0013b0  488a              LDR      r0,|L1.5596|
0013b2  8880              LDRH     r0,[r0,#4]  ; lcddev
0013b4  f5a041a8          SUB      r1,r0,#0x5400
0013b8  3908              SUBS     r1,r1,#8
0013ba  d17e              BNE      |L1.5306|
;;;909    	{
;;;910    		LCD_WriteReg(0x01,0x0100);								  
0013bc  f44f7180          MOV      r1,#0x100
0013c0  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
0013c2  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;911    		LCD_WriteReg(0x02,0x0700);//LCD Driving Waveform Contral 
0013c6  f44f61e0          MOV      r1,#0x700
0013ca  2002              MOVS     r0,#2
0013cc  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;912    		LCD_WriteReg(0x03,0x1030);//Entry Mode设置

0013d4  2003              MOVS     r0,#3
0013d6  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;913    		//指针从左至右自上而下的自动增模式
;;;914    		//Normal Mode(Window Mode disable)
;;;915    		//RGB格式
;;;916    		//16位数据2次传输的8总线设置
;;;917    		LCD_WriteReg(0x04,0x0000); //Scalling Control register     
0013da  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
0013dc  2004              MOVS     r0,#4
0013de  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;918    		LCD_WriteReg(0x08,0x0207); //Display Control 2 
0013e2  f2402107          MOV      r1,#0x207
0013e6  2008              MOVS     r0,#8

;;;919    		LCD_WriteReg(0x09,0x0000); //Display Control 3

0013ee  2009              MOVS     r0,#9
0013f0  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;920    		LCD_WriteReg(0x0A,0x0000); //Frame Cycle Control
