0013f8  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;921    		LCD_WriteReg(0x0C,0x0000); //External Display Interface Control 1 
0013fc  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
0013fe  200c              MOVS     r0,#0xc
001400  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;922    		LCD_WriteReg(0x0D,0x0000); //Frame Maker Position		 
001404  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
001406  200d              MOVS     r0,#0xd
001408  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;923    		LCD_WriteReg(0x0F,0x0000); //External Display Interface Control 2 
00140c  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
00140e  200f              MOVS     r0,#0xf
001410  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;924     		delay_ms(20);
001414  2014              MOVS     r0,#0x14
001416  f7fffffe          BL       delay_ms
;;;925    		//TFT 液晶彩色图像显示方法14
;;;926    		LCD_WriteReg(0x10,0x16B0); //0x14B0 //Power Control 1
00141a  f24161b0          MOV      r1,#0x16b0
00141e  2010              MOVS     r0,#0x10
001420  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;927    		LCD_WriteReg(0x11,0x0001); //0x0007 //Power Control 2
001424  2101              MOVS     r1,#1
001426  2011              MOVS     r0,#0x11
001428  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;928    		LCD_WriteReg(0x17,0x0001); //0x0000 //Power Control 3
00142c  2101              MOVS     r1,#1
00142e  2017              MOVS     r0,#0x17
001430  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;929    		LCD_WriteReg(0x12,0x0138); //0x013B //Power Control 4

001438  2012              MOVS     r0,#0x12
00143a  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;930    		LCD_WriteReg(0x13,0x0800); //0x0800 //Power Control 5

001442  2013              MOVS     r0,#0x13

;;;931    		LCD_WriteReg(0x29,0x0009); //NVM read data 2

00144a  2029              MOVS     r0,#0x29

;;;932    		LCD_WriteReg(0x2a,0x0009); //NVM read data 3
001450  2109              MOVS     r1,#9

;;;933    		LCD_WriteReg(0xa4,0x0000);

00145c  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;934    		LCD_WriteReg(0x50,0x0000); //设置操作窗口的X轴开始列
001460  2100              MOVS     r1,#0

;;;935    		LCD_WriteReg(0x51,0x00EF); //设置操作窗口的X轴结束列

00146a  2051              MOVS     r0,#0x51

;;;936    		LCD_WriteReg(0x52,0x0000); //设置操作窗口的Y轴开始行

001472  2052              MOVS     r0,#0x52
001474  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;937    		LCD_WriteReg(0x53,0x013F); //设置操作窗口的Y轴结束行
001478  f240113f          MOV      r1,#0x13f
00147c  2053              MOVS     r0,#0x53
00147e  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;938    		LCD_WriteReg(0x60,0x2700); //Driver Output Control
001482  f44f511c          MOV      r1,#0x2700
001486  2060              MOVS     r0,#0x60
001488  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;939    		//设置屏幕的点数以及扫描的起始行
;;;940    		LCD_WriteReg(0x61,0x0001); //Driver Output Control
00148c  2101              MOVS     r1,#1
00148e  2061              MOVS     r0,#0x61
001490  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;941    		LCD_WriteReg(0x6A,0x0000); //Vertical Scroll Control
001494  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
001496  206a              MOVS     r0,#0x6a
001498  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;942    		LCD_WriteReg(0x80,0x0000); //Display Position C Partial Display 1
00149c  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
00149e  2080              MOVS     r0,#0x80
0014a0  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;943    		LCD_WriteReg(0x81,0x0000); //RAM Address Start C Partial Display 1
0014a4  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
0014a6  2081              MOVS     r0,#0x81
0014a8  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;944    		LCD_WriteReg(0x82,0x0000); //RAM address End - Partial Display 1
0014ac  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
0014ae  2082              MOVS     r0,#0x82
0014b0  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;945    		LCD_WriteReg(0x83,0x0000); //Display Position C Partial Display 2

                  |L1.5306|
0014ba  e023              B        |L1.5380|
                  |L1.5308|

;;;947    		LCD_WriteReg(0x85,0x0000); //RAM address End C Partail Display2

;;;1281   		LCD_WriteReg(0X93,0X0100);   
001f30  f44f7180          MOV      r1,#0x100
001f34  2093              MOVS     r0,#0x93
001f36  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;1282    		LCD_WriteReg(0XA0,0X3000);   
001f3a  f44f5140          MOV      r1,#0x3000
001f3e  20a0              MOVS     r0,#0xa0
001f40  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;1283    		LCD_WriteReg(0XA3,0X0010);   
001f44  2110              MOVS     r1,#0x10
001f46  20a3              MOVS     r0,#0xa3
001f48  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;1284   		LCD_WriteReg(0X07,0X0001);   
001f4c  2101              MOVS     r1,#1
001f4e  2007              MOVS     r0,#7
001f50  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;1285   		LCD_WriteReg(0X07,0X0021);   
001f54  2121              MOVS     r1,#0x21
001f56  2007              MOVS     r0,#7
001f58  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;1286   		LCD_WriteReg(0X07,0X0023);   
001f5c  2123              MOVS     r1,#0x23
001f5e  2007              MOVS     r0,#7
001f60  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;1287   		LCD_WriteReg(0X07,0X0033);   
001f64  2133              MOVS     r1,#0x33
001f66  2007              MOVS     r0,#7
001f68  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
;;;1288   		LCD_WriteReg(0X07,0X0133);   
001f6c  f2401133          MOV      r1,#0x133
001f70  2007              MOVS     r0,#7
001f72  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteReg
                  |L1.8054|
;;;1289   	}		 
;;;1290   	LCD_Display_Dir(0);		 	//默认为竖屏
001f76  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
001f78  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_Display_Dir
;;;1291   	LCD_LED=1;					//点亮背光
001f7c  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
001f7e  493f              LDR      r1,|L1.8316|
001f80  6008              STR      r0,[r1,#0]
;;;1292   	LCD_Clear(WHITE);
001f82  f64f70ff          MOV      r0,#0xffff
001f86  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_Clear
;;;1293   }  
001f8a  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;1294   //清屏函数
                          ENDP

                  LCD_Fill PROC
;;;1319   //color:要填充的颜色
;;;1320   void LCD_Fill(u16 sx,u16 sy,u16 ex,u16 ey,u16 color)
001f8c  e92d4ff8          PUSH     {r3-r11,lr}
;;;1321   {          
001f90  4604              MOV      r4,r0
001f92  460d              MOV      r5,r1
001f94  4616              MOV      r6,r2
001f96  461f              MOV      r7,r3
;;;1322   	u16 i,j;
;;;1323   	u16 xlen=0;
001f98  f04f0a00          MOV      r10,#0
;;;1324   	u16 temp;
;;;1325   	if((lcddev.id==0X6804)&&(lcddev.dir==1))	//6804横屏的时候特殊处理  
001f9c  4836              LDR      r0,|L1.8312|
001f9e  8880              LDRH     r0,[r0,#4]  ; lcddev
001fa0  f5a041d0          SUB      r1,r0,#0x6800
001fa4  3904              SUBS     r1,#4
001fa6  d128              BNE      |L1.8186|
001fa8  4833              LDR      r0,|L1.8312|
001faa  7980              LDRB     r0,[r0,#6]  ; lcddev
001fac  2801              CMP      r0,#1
001fae  d124              BNE      |L1.8186|
;;;1326   	{
;;;1327   		temp=sx;
001fb0  46a3              MOV      r11,r4
;;;1328   		sx=sy;
001fb2  462c              MOV      r4,r5
;;;1329   		sy=lcddev.width-ex-1;	  
001fb4  4830              LDR      r0,|L1.8312|
001fb6  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]  ; lcddev
001fb8  1b80              SUBS     r0,r0,r6
001fba  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1
001fbc  b285              UXTH     r5,r0
;;;1330   		ex=ey;
001fbe  463e              MOV      r6,r7
;;;1331   		ey=lcddev.width-temp-1;
001fc0  482d              LDR      r0,|L1.8312|
001fc2  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]  ; lcddev
001fc4  eba0000b          SUB      r0,r0,r11
001fc8  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1
001fca  b287              UXTH     r7,r0
;;;1332    		lcddev.dir=0;	 
001fcc  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
001fce  492a              LDR      r1,|L1.8312|
001fd0  7188              STRB     r0,[r1,#6]
;;;1333    		lcddev.setxcmd=0X2A;
001fd2  202a              MOVS     r0,#0x2a
001fd4  7208              STRB     r0,[r1,#8]
;;;1334   		lcddev.setycmd=0X2B;  	 			
001fd6  202b              MOVS     r0,#0x2b
001fd8  7248              STRB     r0,[r1,#9]
;;;1335   		LCD_Fill(sx,sy,ex,ey,color);  
001fda  9b0a              LDR      r3,[sp,#0x28]
001fdc  9300              STR      r3,[sp,#0]
001fde  463b              MOV      r3,r7
001fe0  4632              MOV      r2,r6
001fe2  4629              MOV      r1,r5
001fe4  4620              MOV      r0,r4
001fe6  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_Fill
;;;1336    		lcddev.dir=1;	 
001fea  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
001fec  4922              LDR      r1,|L1.8312|
001fee  7188              STRB     r0,[r1,#6]
;;;1337     		lcddev.setxcmd=0X2B;
001ff0  202b              MOVS     r0,#0x2b
001ff2  7208              STRB     r0,[r1,#8]
;;;1338   		lcddev.setycmd=0X2A;  	 
001ff4  202a              MOVS     r0,#0x2a
001ff6  7248              STRB     r0,[r1,#9]
001ff8  e01d              B        |L1.8246|
                  |L1.8186|
;;;1339    	}else
;;;1340   	{
;;;1341   		xlen=ex-sx+1;	 
001ffa  1b30              SUBS     r0,r6,r4
001ffc  1c40              ADDS     r0,r0,#1
001ffe  fa1ffa80          UXTH     r10,r0
;;;1342   		for(i=sy;i<=ey;i++)
002002  46a8              MOV      r8,r5
002004  e015              B        |L1.8242|
                  |L1.8198|
;;;1343   		{
;;;1344   		 	LCD_SetCursor(sx,i);      				//设置光标位置 
002006  4641              MOV      r1,r8
002008  4620              MOV      r0,r4
00200a  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_SetCursor
;;;1345   			LCD_WriteRAM_Prepare();     			//开始写入GRAM	  
00200e  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteRAM_Prepare
;;;1346   			for(j=0;j<xlen;j++)LCD_WR_DATA(color);	//设置光标位置 	    
002012  f04f0900          MOV      r9,#0
002016  e006              B        |L1.8230|
                  |L1.8216|
002018  980a              LDR      r0,[sp,#0x28]
00201a  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WR_DATA
00201e  f1090001          ADD      r0,r9,#1
002022  fa1ff980          UXTH     r9,r0
                  |L1.8230|
002026  45d1              CMP      r9,r10
002028  dbf6              BLT      |L1.8216|
00202a  f1080001          ADD      r0,r8,#1              ;1342
00202e  fa1ff880          UXTH     r8,r0                 ;1342
                  |L1.8242|
002032  45b8              CMP      r8,r7                 ;1342
002034  dde7              BLE      |L1.8198|
                  |L1.8246|
;;;1347   		}
;;;1348   	}	 
;;;1349   }  
002036  e8bd8ff8          POP      {r3-r11,pc}
;;;1350   //在指定区域内填充指定颜色块			 
                          ENDP

                  LCD_Color_Fill PROC
;;;1352   //color:要填充的颜色
;;;1353   void LCD_Color_Fill(u16 sx,u16 sy,u16 ex,u16 ey,u16 *color)
00203a  e92d4ff8          PUSH     {r3-r11,lr}
;;;1354   {  
00203e  4604              MOV      r4,r0
002040  460d              MOV      r5,r1
002042  4616              MOV      r6,r2
002044  461f              MOV      r7,r3
002046  f8dd8028          LDR      r8,[sp,#0x28]
;;;1355   	u16 height,width;
;;;1356   	u16 i,j;
;;;1357   	width=ex-sx+1; 			//得到填充的宽度
00204a  1b30              SUBS     r0,r6,r4
00204c  1c40              ADDS     r0,r0,#1
00204e  b280              UXTH     r0,r0
002050  9000              STR      r0,[sp,#0]
;;;1358   	height=ey-sy+1;			//高度
002052  1b78              SUBS     r0,r7,r5
002054  1c40              ADDS     r0,r0,#1
002056  fa1ff980          UXTH     r9,r0
;;;1359    	for(i=0;i<height;i++)
00205a  f04f0a00          MOV      r10,#0
00205e  e020              B        |L1.8354|
                  |L1.8288|
;;;1360   	{
;;;1361    		LCD_SetCursor(sx,sy+i);   	//设置光标位置 
002060  eb05000a          ADD      r0,r5,r10
002064  b281              UXTH     r1,r0
002066  4620              MOV      r0,r4
002068  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_SetCursor
;;;1362   		LCD_WriteRAM_Prepare();     //开始写入GRAM
00206c  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_WriteRAM_Prepare
;;;1363   		for(j=0;j<width;j++)LCD->LCD_RAM=color[i*height+j];//写入数据 
002070  f04f0b00          MOV      r11,#0
002074  e00e              B        |L1.8340|
002076  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L1.8312|
                          DCD      lcddev
                  |L1.8316|
                          DCD      0x42218180
                  |L1.8320|
002080  fb0ab009          MLA      r0,r10,r9,r11
002084  f8380010          LDRH     r0,[r8,r0,LSL #1]
002088  49f7              LDR      r1,|L1.9320|
00208a  8008              STRH     r0,[r1,#0]
00208c  f10b0001          ADD      r0,r11,#1
002090  fa1ffb80          UXTH     r11,r0
                  |L1.8340|
002094  9800              LDR      r0,[sp,#0]
002096  4583              CMP      r11,r0
002098  dbf2              BLT      |L1.8320|
00209a  f10a0001          ADD      r0,r10,#1             ;1359
00209e  fa1ffa80          UXTH     r10,r0                ;1359
                  |L1.8354|
0020a2  45ca              CMP      r10,r9                ;1359
0020a4  dbdc              BLT      |L1.8288|
;;;1364   	}	  
;;;1365   }  
0020a6  e8bd8ff8          POP      {r3-r11,pc}
;;;1366   //画线
                          ENDP

                  LCD_DrawLine PROC
;;;1368   //x2,y2:终点坐标  
;;;1369   void LCD_DrawLine(u16 x1, u16 y1, u16 x2, u16 y2)
0020aa  e92d4fff          PUSH     {r0-r11,lr}
;;;1370   {
0020ae  b085              SUB      sp,sp,#0x14
0020b0  4604              MOV      r4,r0
0020b2  460d              MOV      r5,r1
0020b4  4616              MOV      r6,r2
;;;1371   	u16 t; 
;;;1372   	int xerr=0,yerr=0,delta_x,delta_y,distance; 
0020b6  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
0020b8  9004              STR      r0,[sp,#0x10]
0020ba  9003              STR      r0,[sp,#0xc]
;;;1373   	int incx,incy,uRow,uCol; 
;;;1374   	delta_x=x2-x1; //计算坐标增量 
0020bc  eba60804          SUB      r8,r6,r4
;;;1375   	delta_y=y2-y1; 
0020c0  9808              LDR      r0,[sp,#0x20]
0020c2  eba00905          SUB      r9,r0,r5
;;;1376   	uRow=x1; 
0020c6  46a3              MOV      r11,r4
;;;1377   	uCol=y1; 
0020c8  9500              STR      r5,[sp,#0]
;;;1378   	if(delta_x>0)incx=1; //设置单步方向 
0020ca  f1b80f00          CMP      r8,#0
0020ce  dd02              BLE      |L1.8406|
0020d0  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
0020d2  9001              STR      r0,[sp,#4]
0020d4  e00a              B        |L1.8428|
                  |L1.8406|
;;;1379   	else if(delta_x==0)incx=0;//垂直线 
0020d6  f1b80f00          CMP      r8,#0
0020da  d102              BNE      |L1.8418|
0020dc  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
0020de  9001              STR      r0,[sp,#4]
0020e0  e004              B        |L1.8428|
                  |L1.8418|
;;;1380   	else {incx=-1;delta_x=-delta_x;} 
0020e2  f04f30ff          MOV      r0,#0xffffffff
0020e6  9001              STR      r0,[sp,#4]
0020e8  f1c80800          RSB      r8,r8,#0
                  |L1.8428|
;;;1381   	if(delta_y>0)incy=1; 
0020ec  f1b90f00          CMP      r9,#0
0020f0  dd02              BLE      |L1.8440|
0020f2  f04f0a01          MOV      r10,#1
0020f6  e009              B        |L1.8460|
                  |L1.8440|
;;;1382   	else if(delta_y==0)incy=0;//水平线 
0020f8  f1b90f00          CMP      r9,#0
0020fc  d102              BNE      |L1.8452|
0020fe  f04f0a00          MOV      r10,#0
002102  e003              B        |L1.8460|
                  |L1.8452|
;;;1383   	else{incy=-1;delta_y=-delta_y;} 
002104  f04f3aff          MOV      r10,#0xffffffff
002108  f1c90900          RSB      r9,r9,#0
                  |L1.8460|
;;;1384   	if( delta_x>delta_y)distance=delta_x; //选取基本增量坐标轴 
00210c  45c8              CMP      r8,r9
00210e  dd02              BLE      |L1.8470|
002110  f8cd8008          STR      r8,[sp,#8]
002114  e001              B        |L1.8474|
                  |L1.8470|
;;;1385   	else distance=delta_y; 
002116  f8cd9008          STR      r9,[sp,#8]
                  |L1.8474|
;;;1386   	for(t=0;t<=distance+1;t++ )//画线输出 
00211a  2700              MOVS     r7,#0
00211c  e022              B        |L1.8548|
                  |L1.8478|
;;;1387   	{  
;;;1388   		LCD_DrawPoint(uRow,uCol);//画点 
00211e  9800              LDR      r0,[sp,#0]
002120  b281              UXTH     r1,r0
002122  fa1ff08b          UXTH     r0,r11
002126  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DrawPoint
;;;1389   		xerr+=delta_x ; 
00212a  9804              LDR      r0,[sp,#0x10]
00212c  4440              ADD      r0,r0,r8
00212e  9004              STR      r0,[sp,#0x10]
;;;1390   		yerr+=delta_y ; 
002130  9803              LDR      r0,[sp,#0xc]
002132  4448              ADD      r0,r0,r9
002134  9003              STR      r0,[sp,#0xc]
;;;1391   		if(xerr>distance) 
002136  9902              LDR      r1,[sp,#8]
002138  9804              LDR      r0,[sp,#0x10]
00213a  4288              CMP      r0,r1
00213c  dd05              BLE      |L1.8522|
;;;1392   		{ 
;;;1393   			xerr-=distance; 
00213e  9904              LDR      r1,[sp,#0x10]
002140  9802              LDR      r0,[sp,#8]
002142  1a08              SUBS     r0,r1,r0
002144  9004              STR      r0,[sp,#0x10]
;;;1394   			uRow+=incx; 
002146  9801              LDR      r0,[sp,#4]
002148  4483              ADD      r11,r11,r0
                  |L1.8522|
;;;1395   		} 
;;;1396   		if(yerr>distance) 
00214a  e9dd1002          LDRD     r1,r0,[sp,#8]
00214e  4288              CMP      r0,r1
002150  dd06              BLE      |L1.8544|
;;;1397   		{ 
;;;1398   			yerr-=distance; 
002152  e9dd1002          LDRD     r1,r0,[sp,#8]
002156  1a40              SUBS     r0,r0,r1
002158  9003              STR      r0,[sp,#0xc]
;;;1399   			uCol+=incy; 
00215a  9800              LDR      r0,[sp,#0]
00215c  4450              ADD      r0,r0,r10
00215e  9000              STR      r0,[sp,#0]
                  |L1.8544|
002160  1c78              ADDS     r0,r7,#1              ;1386
002162  b287              UXTH     r7,r0                 ;1386
                  |L1.8548|
002164  9802              LDR      r0,[sp,#8]            ;1386
002166  1c40              ADDS     r0,r0,#1              ;1386
002168  4287              CMP      r7,r0                 ;1386
00216a  ddd8              BLE      |L1.8478|
;;;1400   		} 
;;;1401   	}  
;;;1402   }    
00216c  b009              ADD      sp,sp,#0x24
00216e  e8bd8ff0          POP      {r4-r11,pc}
;;;1403   //画矩形	  
                          ENDP

                  LCD_DrawRectangle PROC
;;;1404   //(x1,y1),(x2,y2):矩形的对角坐标
;;;1405   void LCD_DrawRectangle(u16 x1, u16 y1, u16 x2, u16 y2)
002172  b5f0              PUSH     {r4-r7,lr}
;;;1406   {
002174  4604              MOV      r4,r0
002176  460d              MOV      r5,r1
002178  4616              MOV      r6,r2
00217a  461f              MOV      r7,r3
;;;1407   	LCD_DrawLine(x1,y1,x2,y1);
00217c  462b              MOV      r3,r5
00217e  4632              MOV      r2,r6
002180  4629              MOV      r1,r5
002182  4620              MOV      r0,r4
002184  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DrawLine
;;;1408   	LCD_DrawLine(x1,y1,x1,y2);
002188  463b              MOV      r3,r7
00218a  4622              MOV      r2,r4
00218c  4629              MOV      r1,r5
00218e  4620              MOV      r0,r4
002190  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DrawLine
;;;1409   	LCD_DrawLine(x1,y2,x2,y2);
002194  463b              MOV      r3,r7
002196  4632              MOV      r2,r6
002198  4639              MOV      r1,r7
00219a  4620              MOV      r0,r4
00219c  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DrawLine
;;;1410   	LCD_DrawLine(x2,y1,x2,y2);
0021a0  463b              MOV      r3,r7
0021a2  4632              MOV      r2,r6
0021a4  4629              MOV      r1,r5
0021a6  4630              MOV      r0,r6
0021a8  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DrawLine
;;;1411   }
0021ac  bdf0              POP      {r4-r7,pc}
;;;1412   //在指定位置画一个指定大小的圆
                          ENDP

                  Draw_Circle PROC
;;;1414   //r    :半径
;;;1415   void Draw_Circle(u16 x0,u16 y0,u8 r)
0021ae  e92d43f0          PUSH     {r4-r9,lr}
;;;1416   {
0021b2  4604              MOV      r4,r0
0021b4  460d              MOV      r5,r1
0021b6  4616              MOV      r6,r2
;;;1417   	int a,b;
;;;1418   	int di;
;;;1419   	a=0;b=r;	  
0021b8  2700              MOVS     r7,#0
0021ba  46b0              MOV      r8,r6
;;;1420   	di=3-(r<<1);             //判断下个点位置的标志
0021bc  2003              MOVS     r0,#3
0021be  eba00946          SUB      r9,r0,r6,LSL #1
;;;1421   	while(a<=b)
0021c2  e046              B        |L1.8786|
                  |L1.8644|
;;;1422   	{
;;;1423   		LCD_DrawPoint(x0+a,y0-b);             //5
0021c4  eba50208          SUB      r2,r5,r8
0021c8  b291              UXTH     r1,r2
0021ca  19e2              ADDS     r2,r4,r7
0021cc  b290              UXTH     r0,r2
0021ce  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DrawPoint
;;;1424    		LCD_DrawPoint(x0+b,y0-a);             //0           
0021d2  1bea              SUBS     r2,r5,r7
0021d4  b291              UXTH     r1,r2
0021d6  eb040208          ADD      r2,r4,r8
0021da  b290              UXTH     r0,r2
0021dc  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DrawPoint
;;;1425   		LCD_DrawPoint(x0+b,y0+a);             //4               
0021e0  19ea              ADDS     r2,r5,r7
0021e2  b291              UXTH     r1,r2
0021e4  eb040208          ADD      r2,r4,r8
0021e8  b290              UXTH     r0,r2
0021ea  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DrawPoint
;;;1426   		LCD_DrawPoint(x0+a,y0+b);             //6 
0021ee  eb050208          ADD      r2,r5,r8
0021f2  b291              UXTH     r1,r2
0021f4  19e2              ADDS     r2,r4,r7
0021f6  b290              UXTH     r0,r2
0021f8  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DrawPoint
;;;1427   		LCD_DrawPoint(x0-a,y0+b);             //1       
0021fc  eb050208          ADD      r2,r5,r8
002200  b291              UXTH     r1,r2
002202  1be2              SUBS     r2,r4,r7
002204  b290              UXTH     r0,r2
002206  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DrawPoint
;;;1428    		LCD_DrawPoint(x0-b,y0+a);             
00220a  19ea              ADDS     r2,r5,r7
00220c  b291              UXTH     r1,r2
00220e  eba40208          SUB      r2,r4,r8
002212  b290              UXTH     r0,r2
002214  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DrawPoint
;;;1429   		LCD_DrawPoint(x0-a,y0-b);             //2             
002218  eba50208          SUB      r2,r5,r8
00221c  b291              UXTH     r1,r2
00221e  1be2              SUBS     r2,r4,r7
002220  b290              UXTH     r0,r2
002222  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DrawPoint
;;;1430     		LCD_DrawPoint(x0-b,y0-a);             //7     	         
002226  1bea              SUBS     r2,r5,r7
002228  b291              UXTH     r1,r2
00222a  eba40208          SUB      r2,r4,r8
00222e  b290              UXTH     r0,r2
002230  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DrawPoint
;;;1431   		a++;
002234  1c7f              ADDS     r7,r7,#1
;;;1432   		//使用Bresenham算法画圆     
;;;1433   		if(di<0)di +=4*a+6;	  
002236  f1b90f00          CMP      r9,#0
00223a  da03              BGE      |L1.8772|
00223c  00b8              LSLS     r0,r7,#2
00223e  1d80              ADDS     r0,r0,#6
002240  4481              ADD      r9,r9,r0
002242  e006              B        |L1.8786|
                  |L1.8772|
;;;1434   		else
;;;1435   		{
;;;1436   			di+=10+4*(a-b);   
002244  eba70008          SUB      r0,r7,r8
002248  0080              LSLS     r0,r0,#2
00224a  300a              ADDS     r0,r0,#0xa
00224c  4481              ADD      r9,r9,r0
;;;1437   			b--;
00224e  f1a80801          SUB      r8,r8,#1
                  |L1.8786|
002252  4547              CMP      r7,r8                 ;1421
002254  ddb6              BLE      |L1.8644|
;;;1438   		} 						    
;;;1439   	}
;;;1440   } 									  
002256  e8bd83f0          POP      {r4-r9,pc}
;;;1441   //在指定位置显示一个字符
                          ENDP

                  LCD_ShowChar PROC
;;;1445   //mode:叠加方式(1)还是非叠加方式(0)
;;;1446   void LCD_ShowChar(u16 x,u16 y,u8 num,u8 size,u8 mode)
00225a  e92d4ff8          PUSH     {r3-r11,lr}
;;;1447   {  							  
00225e  4604              MOV      r4,r0
002260  460d              MOV      r5,r1
002262  4616              MOV      r6,r2
002264  461f              MOV      r7,r3
;;;1448       u8 temp,t1,t;
;;;1449   	u16 y0=y;
002266  9500              STR      r5,[sp,#0]
;;;1450   	u16 colortemp=POINT_COLOR;      			     
002268  4880              LDR      r0,|L1.9324|
00226a  f8b0b000          LDRH     r11,[r0,#0]  ; POINT_COLOR
;;;1451   	//设置窗口		   
;;;1452   	num=num-' ';//得到偏移后的值
00226e  f1a60020          SUB      r0,r6,#0x20
002272  b2c6              UXTB     r6,r0
;;;1453   	if(!mode) //非叠加方式
002274  980a              LDR      r0,[sp,#0x28]
002276  2800              CMP      r0,#0
002278  d150              BNE      |L1.8988|
;;;1454   	{
;;;1455   	    for(t=0;t<size;t++)
00227a  4682              MOV      r10,r0
00227c  e04b              B        |L1.8982|
                  |L1.8830|
;;;1456   	    {   
;;;1457   			if(size==12)temp=asc2_1206[num][t];  //调用1206字体
00227e  2f0c              CMP      r7,#0xc
002280  d107              BNE      |L1.8850|
002282  eb060046          ADD      r0,r6,r6,LSL #1
002286  497a              LDR      r1,|L1.9328|
002288  eb010080          ADD      r0,r1,r0,LSL #2
00228c  f810800a          LDRB     r8,[r0,r10]
002290  e004              B        |L1.8860|
                  |L1.8850|
;;;1458   			else temp=asc2_1608[num][t];		 //调用1608字体 	                          
002292  4878              LDR      r0,|L1.9332|
002294  eb001006          ADD      r0,r0,r6,LSL #4
002298  f810800a          LDRB     r8,[r0,r10]
                  |L1.8860|
;;;1459   	        for(t1=0;t1<8;t1++)
00229c  f04f0900          MOV      r9,#0
0022a0  e031              B        |L1.8966|
                  |L1.8866|
;;;1460   			{			    
;;;1461   		        if(temp&0x80)POINT_COLOR=colortemp;
0022a2  f0180f80          TST      r8,#0x80
0022a6  d003              BEQ      |L1.8880|
0022a8  4870              LDR      r0,|L1.9324|
0022aa  f8a0b000          STRH     r11,[r0,#0]
0022ae  e003              B        |L1.8888|
                  |L1.8880|
;;;1462   				else POINT_COLOR=BACK_COLOR;
0022b0  4871              LDR      r0,|L1.9336|
0022b2  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]  ; BACK_COLOR
0022b4  496d              LDR      r1,|L1.9324|
0022b6  8008              STRH     r0,[r1,#0]
                  |L1.8888|
;;;1463   				LCD_DrawPoint(x,y);	
0022b8  4629              MOV      r1,r5
0022ba  4620              MOV      r0,r4
0022bc  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DrawPoint
;;;1464   				temp<<=1;
0022c0  ea4f6048          LSL      r0,r8,#25
0022c4  ea4f6810          LSR      r8,r0,#24
;;;1465   				y++;
0022c8  1c68              ADDS     r0,r5,#1
0022ca  b285              UXTH     r5,r0
;;;1466   				if(x>=lcddev.width){POINT_COLOR=colortemp;return;}//超区域了
0022cc  486b              LDR      r0,|L1.9340|
0022ce  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]  ; lcddev
0022d0  42a0              CMP      r0,r4
0022d2  dc04              BGT      |L1.8926|
0022d4  4865              LDR      r0,|L1.9324|
0022d6  f8a0b000          STRH     r11,[r0,#0]
                  |L1.8922|
;;;1467   				if((y-y0)==size)
;;;1468   				{
;;;1469   					y=y0;
;;;1470   					x++;
;;;1471   					if(x>=lcddev.width){POINT_COLOR=colortemp;return;}//超区域了
;;;1472   					break;
;;;1473   				}
;;;1474   			}  	 
;;;1475   	    }    
;;;1476   	}else//叠加方式
;;;1477   	{
;;;1478   	    for(t=0;t<size;t++)
;;;1479   	    {   
;;;1480   			if(size==12)temp=asc2_1206[num][t];  //调用1206字体
;;;1481   			else temp=asc2_1608[num][t];		 //调用1608字体 	                          
;;;1482   	        for(t1=0;t1<8;t1++)
;;;1483   			{			    
;;;1484   		        if(temp&0x80)LCD_DrawPoint(x,y); 
;;;1485   				temp<<=1;
;;;1486   				y++;
;;;1487   				if(x>=lcddev.height){POINT_COLOR=colortemp;return;}//超区域了
;;;1488   				if((y-y0)==size)
;;;1489   				{
;;;1490   					y=y0;
;;;1491   					x++;
;;;1492   					if(x>=lcddev.width){POINT_COLOR=colortemp;return;}//超区域了
;;;1493   					break;
;;;1494   				}
;;;1495   			}  	 
;;;1496   	    }     
;;;1497   	}
;;;1498   	POINT_COLOR=colortemp;	    	   	 	  
;;;1499   }   
0022da  e8bd8ff8          POP      {r3-r11,pc}
                  |L1.8926|
0022de  9800              LDR      r0,[sp,#0]            ;1467
0022e0  1a28              SUBS     r0,r5,r0              ;1467
0022e2  42b8              CMP      r0,r7                 ;1467
0022e4  d10b              BNE      |L1.8958|
0022e6  9d00              LDR      r5,[sp,#0]            ;1469
0022e8  1c60              ADDS     r0,r4,#1              ;1470
0022ea  b284              UXTH     r4,r0                 ;1470
0022ec  4863              LDR      r0,|L1.9340|
0022ee  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]            ;1471  ; lcddev
0022f0  42a0              CMP      r0,r4                 ;1471
0022f2  dc03              BGT      |L1.8956|
0022f4  485d              LDR      r0,|L1.9324|
0022f6  f8a0b000          STRH     r11,[r0,#0]           ;1471
0022fa  e7ee              B        |L1.8922|
                  |L1.8956|
0022fc  e006              B        |L1.8972|
                  |L1.8958|
0022fe  f1090001          ADD      r0,r9,#1              ;1459
002302  f00009ff          AND      r9,r0,#0xff           ;1459
                  |L1.8966|
002306  f1b90f08          CMP      r9,#8                 ;1459
00230a  dbca              BLT      |L1.8866|
                  |L1.8972|
00230c  bf00              NOP                            ;1472
00230e  f10a0001          ADD      r0,r10,#1             ;1455
002312  f0000aff          AND      r10,r0,#0xff          ;1455
                  |L1.8982|
002316  45ba              CMP      r10,r7                ;1455
002318  dbb1              BLT      |L1.8830|
00231a  e047              B        |L1.9132|
                  |L1.8988|
00231c  f04f0a00          MOV      r10,#0                ;1478
002320  e042              B        |L1.9128|
                  |L1.8994|
002322  2f0c              CMP      r7,#0xc               ;1480
002324  d107              BNE      |L1.9014|
002326  eb060046          ADD      r0,r6,r6,LSL #1       ;1480
00232a  4951              LDR      r1,|L1.9328|
00232c  eb010080          ADD      r0,r1,r0,LSL #2       ;1480
002330  f810800a          LDRB     r8,[r0,r10]           ;1480
002334  e004              B        |L1.9024|
                  |L1.9014|
002336  484f              LDR      r0,|L1.9332|
002338  eb001006          ADD      r0,r0,r6,LSL #4       ;1481
00233c  f810800a          LDRB     r8,[r0,r10]           ;1481
                  |L1.9024|
002340  f04f0900          MOV      r9,#0                 ;1482
002344  e028              B        |L1.9112|
                  |L1.9030|
002346  f0180f80          TST      r8,#0x80              ;1484
00234a  d003              BEQ      |L1.9044|
00234c  4629              MOV      r1,r5                 ;1484
00234e  4620              MOV      r0,r4                 ;1484
002350  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DrawPoint
                  |L1.9044|
002354  ea4f6048          LSL      r0,r8,#25             ;1485
002358  ea4f6810          LSR      r8,r0,#24             ;1485
00235c  1c68              ADDS     r0,r5,#1              ;1486
00235e  b285              UXTH     r5,r0                 ;1486
002360  4846              LDR      r0,|L1.9340|
002362  8840              LDRH     r0,[r0,#2]            ;1487  ; lcddev
002364  42a0              CMP      r0,r4                 ;1487
002366  dc03              BGT      |L1.9072|
002368  4840              LDR      r0,|L1.9324|
00236a  f8a0b000          STRH     r11,[r0,#0]           ;1487
00236e  e7b4              B        |L1.8922|
                  |L1.9072|
002370  9800              LDR      r0,[sp,#0]            ;1488
002372  1a28              SUBS     r0,r5,r0              ;1488
002374  42b8              CMP      r0,r7                 ;1488
002376  d10b              BNE      |L1.9104|
002378  9d00              LDR      r5,[sp,#0]            ;1490
00237a  1c60              ADDS     r0,r4,#1              ;1491
00237c  b284              UXTH     r4,r0                 ;1491
00237e  483f              LDR      r0,|L1.9340|
002380  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]            ;1492  ; lcddev
002382  42a0              CMP      r0,r4                 ;1492
002384  dc03              BGT      |L1.9102|
002386  4839              LDR      r0,|L1.9324|
002388  f8a0b000          STRH     r11,[r0,#0]           ;1492
00238c  e7a5              B        |L1.8922|
                  |L1.9102|
00238e  e006              B        |L1.9118|
                  |L1.9104|
002390  f1090001          ADD      r0,r9,#1              ;1482
002394  f00009ff          AND      r9,r0,#0xff           ;1482
                  |L1.9112|
002398  f1b90f08          CMP      r9,#8                 ;1482
00239c  dbd3              BLT      |L1.9030|
                  |L1.9118|
00239e  bf00              NOP                            ;1493
0023a0  f10a0001          ADD      r0,r10,#1             ;1478
0023a4  f0000aff          AND      r10,r0,#0xff          ;1478
                  |L1.9128|
0023a8  45ba              CMP      r10,r7                ;1478
0023aa  dbba              BLT      |L1.8994|
                  |L1.9132|
0023ac  482f              LDR      r0,|L1.9324|
0023ae  f8a0b000          STRH     r11,[r0,#0]           ;1498
0023b2  e792              B        |L1.8922|
;;;1500   //m^n函数
                          ENDP

                  LCD_Pow PROC
;;;1501   //返回值:m^n次方.
;;;1502   u32 LCD_Pow(u8 m,u8 n)
0023b4  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;1503   {
0023b6  4602              MOV      r2,r0
;;;1504   	u32 result=1;	 
0023b8  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
;;;1505   	while(n--)result*=m;    
0023ba  e000              B        |L1.9150|
                  |L1.9148|
0023bc  4350              MULS     r0,r2,r0
                  |L1.9150|
0023be  000b              MOVS     r3,r1
0023c0  f1a10401          SUB      r4,r1,#1
0023c4  b2e1              UXTB     r1,r4
0023c6  d1f9              BNE      |L1.9148|
;;;1506   	return result;
;;;1507   }			 
0023c8  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;1508   //显示数字,高位为0,则不显示
                          ENDP

                  LCD_ShowNum PROC
;;;1513   //num:数值(0~4294967295);	 
;;;1514   void LCD_ShowNum(u16 x,u16 y,u32 num,u8 len,u8 size)
0023ca  e92d4fff          PUSH     {r0-r11,lr}
;;;1515   {         	
0023ce  b081              SUB      sp,sp,#4
0023d0  4604              MOV      r4,r0
0023d2  4615              MOV      r5,r2
0023d4  461e              MOV      r6,r3
0023d6  9f0e              LDR      r7,[sp,#0x38]
;;;1516   	u8 t,temp;
;;;1517   	u8 enshow=0;						   
0023d8  f04f0a00          MOV      r10,#0
;;;1518   	for(t=0;t<len;t++)
0023dc  46d0              MOV      r8,r10
0023de  e03e              B        |L1.9310|
                  |L1.9184|
;;;1519   	{
;;;1520   		temp=(num/LCD_Pow(10,len-t-1))%10;
0023e0  eba60008          SUB      r0,r6,r8
0023e4  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1
0023e6  b2c1              UXTB     r1,r0
0023e8  200a              MOVS     r0,#0xa
0023ea  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_Pow
0023ee  fbb5f0f0          UDIV     r0,r5,r0
0023f2  210a              MOVS     r1,#0xa
0023f4  fbb0f2f1          UDIV     r2,r0,r1
0023f8  fb010012          MLS      r0,r1,r2,r0
0023fc  f00009ff          AND      r9,r0,#0xff
;;;1521   		if(enshow==0&&t<(len-1))
002400  f1ba0f00          CMP      r10,#0
002404  d116              BNE      |L1.9268|
002406  1e70              SUBS     r0,r6,#1
002408  4540              CMP      r0,r8
00240a  dd13              BLE      |L1.9268|
;;;1522   		{
;;;1523   			if(temp==0)
00240c  f1b90f00          CMP      r9,#0
002410  d10e              BNE      |L1.9264|
;;;1524   			{
;;;1525   				LCD_ShowChar(x+(size/2)*t,y,' ',size,0);
002412  2300              MOVS     r3,#0
002414  46bb              MOV      r11,r7
002416  eb0771d7          ADD      r1,r7,r7,LSR #31
00241a  1049              ASRS     r1,r1,#1
00241c  fb014108          MLA      r1,r1,r8,r4
002420  b288              UXTH     r0,r1
002422  9300              STR      r3,[sp,#0]
002424  463b              MOV      r3,r7
002426  2220              MOVS     r2,#0x20
002428  9902              LDR      r1,[sp,#8]
00242a  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_ShowChar
;;;1526   				continue;
00242e  e012              B        |L1.9302|
                  |L1.9264|
;;;1527   			}else enshow=1; 
002430  f04f0a01          MOV      r10,#1
                  |L1.9268|
;;;1528   		 	 
;;;1529   		}
;;;1530   	 	LCD_ShowChar(x+(size/2)*t,y,temp+'0',size,0); 
002434  2300              MOVS     r3,#0
002436  46bb              MOV      r11,r7
002438  eb0771d7          ADD      r1,r7,r7,LSR #31
00243c  1049              ASRS     r1,r1,#1
00243e  fb014108          MLA      r1,r1,r8,r4
002442  b288              UXTH     r0,r1
002444  9300              STR      r3,[sp,#0]
002446  463b              MOV      r3,r7
002448  f1090130          ADD      r1,r9,#0x30
00244c  b2ca              UXTB     r2,r1
00244e  9902              LDR      r1,[sp,#8]
002450  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_ShowChar
002454  bf00              NOP                            ;1526
                  |L1.9302|
002456  f1080001          ADD      r0,r8,#1              ;1518
00245a  f00008ff          AND      r8,r0,#0xff           ;1518
                  |L1.9310|
00245e  45b0              CMP      r8,r6                 ;1518
002460  dbbe              BLT      |L1.9184|
;;;1531   	}
;;;1532   } 
002462  b005              ADD      sp,sp,#0x14
002464  e8bd8ff0          POP      {r4-r11,pc}
                  |L1.9320|
                          DCD      0x6c000800
                  |L1.9324|
                          DCD      POINT_COLOR
                  |L1.9328|
                          DCD      asc2_1206
                  |L1.9332|
                          DCD      asc2_1608
                  |L1.9336|
                          DCD      BACK_COLOR
                  |L1.9340|
                          DCD      lcddev
                          ENDP

                  LCD_ShowxNum PROC
;;;1541   //[0]:0,非叠加显示;1,叠加显示.
;;;1542   void LCD_ShowxNum(u16 x,u16 y,u32 num,u8 len,u8 size,u8 mode)
002480  e92d4fff          PUSH     {r0-r11,lr}
;;;1543   {  
002484  b082              SUB      sp,sp,#8
002486  4604              MOV      r4,r0
002488  4615              MOV      r5,r2
00248a  461e              MOV      r6,r3
00248c  e9dd780f          LDRD     r7,r8,[sp,#0x3c]
;;;1544   	u8 t,temp;
;;;1545   	u8 enshow=0;						   
002490  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
002492  9001              STR      r0,[sp,#4]
;;;1546   	for(t=0;t<len;t++)
002494  4681              MOV      r9,r0
002496  e052              B        |L1.9534|
                  |L1.9368|
;;;1547   	{
;;;1548   		temp=(num/LCD_Pow(10,len-t-1))%10;
002498  eba60009          SUB      r0,r6,r9
00249c  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1
00249e  b2c1              UXTB     r1,r0
0024a0  200a              MOVS     r0,#0xa
0024a2  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_Pow
0024a6  fbb5f0f0          UDIV     r0,r5,r0
0024aa  210a              MOVS     r1,#0xa
0024ac  fbb0f2f1          UDIV     r2,r0,r1
0024b0  fb010012          MLS      r0,r1,r2,r0
0024b4  f0000aff          AND      r10,r0,#0xff
;;;1549   		if(enshow==0&&t<(len-1))
0024b8  9801              LDR      r0,[sp,#4]
0024ba  bb50              CBNZ     r0,|L1.9490|
0024bc  1e70              SUBS     r0,r6,#1
0024be  4548              CMP      r0,r9
0024c0  dd27              BLE      |L1.9490|
;;;1550   		{
;;;1551   			if(temp==0)
0024c2  f1ba0f00          CMP      r10,#0
0024c6  d122              BNE      |L1.9486|
;;;1552   			{
;;;1553   				if(mode&0X80)LCD_ShowChar(x+(size/2)*t,y,'0',size,mode&0X01);  
0024c8  f0180f80          TST      r8,#0x80
0024cc  d00f              BEQ      |L1.9454|
0024ce  f0080301          AND      r3,r8,#1
0024d2  46bb              MOV      r11,r7
0024d4  eb0771d7          ADD      r1,r7,r7,LSR #31
0024d8  1049              ASRS     r1,r1,#1
0024da  fb014109          MLA      r1,r1,r9,r4
0024de  b288              UXTH     r0,r1
0024e0  9300              STR      r3,[sp,#0]
0024e2  463b              MOV      r3,r7
0024e4  2230              MOVS     r2,#0x30
0024e6  9903              LDR      r1,[sp,#0xc]
0024e8  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_ShowChar
0024ec  e00e              B        |L1.9484|
                  |L1.9454|
;;;1554   				else LCD_ShowChar(x+(size/2)*t,y,' ',size,mode&0X01);  
0024ee  f0080301          AND      r3,r8,#1
0024f2  46bb              MOV      r11,r7
0024f4  eb0771d7          ADD      r1,r7,r7,LSR #31
0024f8  1049              ASRS     r1,r1,#1
0024fa  fb014109          MLA      r1,r1,r9,r4
0024fe  b288              UXTH     r0,r1
002500  9300              STR      r3,[sp,#0]
002502  463b              MOV      r3,r7
002504  2220              MOVS     r2,#0x20
002506  9903              LDR      r1,[sp,#0xc]
002508  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_ShowChar
                  |L1.9484|
;;;1555    				continue;
00250c  e013              B        |L1.9526|
                  |L1.9486|
;;;1556   			}else enshow=1; 
00250e  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
002510  9001              STR      r0,[sp,#4]
                  |L1.9490|
;;;1557   		 	 
;;;1558   		}
;;;1559   	 	LCD_ShowChar(x+(size/2)*t,y,temp+'0',size,mode&0X01); 
002512  f0080301          AND      r3,r8,#1
002516  46bb              MOV      r11,r7
002518  eb0771d7          ADD      r1,r7,r7,LSR #31
00251c  1049              ASRS     r1,r1,#1
00251e  fb014109          MLA      r1,r1,r9,r4
002522  b288              UXTH     r0,r1
002524  9300              STR      r3,[sp,#0]
002526  463b              MOV      r3,r7
002528  f10a0130          ADD      r1,r10,#0x30
00252c  b2ca              UXTB     r2,r1
00252e  9903              LDR      r1,[sp,#0xc]
002530  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_ShowChar
002534  bf00              NOP                            ;1555
                  |L1.9526|
002536  f1090001          ADD      r0,r9,#1              ;1546
00253a  f00009ff          AND      r9,r0,#0xff           ;1546
                  |L1.9534|
00253e  45b1              CMP      r9,r6                 ;1546
002540  dbaa              BLT      |L1.9368|
;;;1560   	}
;;;1561   } 
002542  b006              ADD      sp,sp,#0x18
002544  e8bd8ff0          POP      {r4-r11,pc}
;;;1562   //显示字符串
                          ENDP

                  LCD_ShowString PROC
;;;1566   //*p:字符串起始地址		  
;;;1567   void LCD_ShowString(u16 x,u16 y,u16 width,u16 height,u8 size,u8 *p)
002548  e92d47f8          PUSH     {r3-r10,lr}
;;;1568   {         
00254c  4604              MOV      r4,r0
00254e  460d              MOV      r5,r1
002550  4616              MOV      r6,r2
002552  461f              MOV      r7,r3
002554  e9dd8909          LDRD     r8,r9,[sp,#0x24]
;;;1569   	u8 x0=x;
002558  f0040aff          AND      r10,r4,#0xff
;;;1570   	width+=x;
00255c  1930              ADDS     r0,r6,r4
00255e  b286              UXTH     r6,r0
;;;1571   	height+=y;
002560  1978              ADDS     r0,r7,r5
002562  b287              UXTH     r7,r0
;;;1572       while((*p<='~')&&(*p>=' '))//判断是不是非法字符!
002564  e019              B        |L1.9626|
                  |L1.9574|
;;;1573       {       
;;;1574           if(x>=width){x=x0;y+=size;}
002566  42b4              CMP      r4,r6
002568  db03              BLT      |L1.9586|
00256a  4654              MOV      r4,r10
00256c  eb050008          ADD      r0,r5,r8
002570  b285              UXTH     r5,r0
                  |L1.9586|
;;;1575           if(y>=height)break;//退出
002572  42bd              CMP      r5,r7
002574  db00              BLT      |L1.9592|
002576  e018              B        |L1.9642|
                  |L1.9592|
;;;1576           LCD_ShowChar(x,y,*p,size,0);
002578  2300              MOVS     r3,#0
00257a  9300              STR      r3,[sp,#0]
00257c  f8992000          LDRB     r2,[r9,#0]
002580  4643              MOV      r3,r8
002582  4629              MOV      r1,r5
002584  4620              MOV      r0,r4
002586  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_ShowChar
;;;1577           x+=size/2;
00258a  4640              MOV      r0,r8
00258c  eb0871d8          ADD      r1,r8,r8,LSR #31
002590  eb040161          ADD      r1,r4,r1,ASR #1
002594  b28c              UXTH     r4,r1
;;;1578           p++;
002596  f1090901          ADD      r9,r9,#1
                  |L1.9626|
00259a  f8990000          LDRB     r0,[r9,#0]            ;1572
00259e  287e              CMP      r0,#0x7e              ;1572
0025a0  dc03              BGT      |L1.9642|
0025a2  f8990000          LDRB     r0,[r9,#0]            ;1572
0025a6  2820              CMP      r0,#0x20              ;1572
0025a8  dadd              BGE      |L1.9574|
                  |L1.9642|
0025aa  bf00              NOP                            ;1575
;;;1579       }  
;;;1580   }
0025ac  e8bd87f8          POP      {r3-r10,pc}
;;;1581   
                          ENDP


                          AREA ||.bss||, DATA, NOINIT, ALIGN=1

                  lcddev
                          %        10

                          AREA ||.constdata||, DATA, READONLY, ALIGN=0
